speaker: [The episode starts off in SpongeBob's living room with him watching a sea anemone dancing on TV, his eyes widen and he moves a little closer. Gary comes up.]
Gary
line: Meow.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Gary! [changes channel to a football game] Uh, uh, I was just looking for the sports channel, Gary. [Someone is knocking on his door.] Come in!

speaker: Patrick
line: [Opens door and walks in] Hey, SpongeBob, wanna see my new shoes? [shows blue tennis shoes]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Wow! Those are great, Patrick! Let's see what they look like on your feet.

speaker: Patrick
line: Uh... [pulls the shoes away] Wouldn't you rather see them on... [shows the shoes on his hands] My hands?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Okay... [has white gloves on his feet] And we can wear gloves on our feet [turns around and has a top hat on his back] and hats on our captain's quarters, too. [shakes his butt]

speaker: Patrick
line: Uh, actually... I have a confession to make. [looks to see that no one is watching, leans to SpongeBob's "ear" and whispers] I don't know how to tie my shoelaces.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [laughs] Do you know how lucky you are to have a friend like me?

speaker: Patrick
line: Yes. [SpongeBob places one foot on the chair]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Look at this knot. Have you ever seen a more perfectly executed shoe-fastening bow?

speaker: Patrick
line: Gosh... Probably not.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I learned when I was just a boy, Patrick and I'm willing to pass on what I know. Go sit over there [Points off-screen behind himself] and let an old pro show you how to do it. [Patrick sits down in the chair and SpongeBob sets his foot on the chair's arm] Pay close attention, Patrick. Well, you start [unties his laces] by taking one lace per hand... [pulls a little on both laces] And then you... Uh, you gotta... Loop the, the...

speaker: Patrick
line: Are you sure you know how to do it?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick, please, shoe-tying requires peace and quiet. Okay, where was I?

speaker: Patrick
line: [SpongeBob gives him a dirty look] Your shoes are still untied. [SpongeBob takes his shoe off the chair]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [looks away] Well, [Patrick looks shocked] I guess you don't want me to show you how to do it.

speaker: Patrick
line: I'm sorry! [covers his mouth with his shoes] I won't interrupt anymore!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I've got it! The first rule of shoe-tying is always start with your right foot. Now the lesson will officially begin. [sets his right foot on the chair arm and unties his laces. Ties his laces but they come undone. SpongeBob laughs nervously and tries again but the laces untie themselves once more. Patrick looks angry at him] That's... "knot" right. [laughs nervously] Get it? Knot... right... hmm...

speaker: Patrick
line: No.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Okay, no more fooling around. [tries to tie the laces again off-screen] I've got it! [lifts up hands to show his fingers tied in a lot of knots. He laughs nervously. He turns around.]

speaker: Patrick
line: What was that? Are you okay, SpongeBob?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [He turns around and looks angry at Patrick] Patrick, aren't you late for something?

speaker: Patrick
line: Oh, poop deck, You're right! [runs and bursts down SpongeBob's front door] We'll have to do this lesson  [Off-Screen] later! Bye SpongeBob!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I can't believe I've forgotten how to tie my own shoes. They've been tied as long as I can remember. [flashbacks to being him as an egg with legs, socks, and shoes only] Well, I'll remember after a good night's sleep. [The scene changes to show the night scene with the island and the moon is shown. The scene changes to show the sunrise scene with the island is then shown shown. The scene changes to show SpongeBob is shown sleeping in his bed snoring with his shoelaces going back and forth. the clock turns to 700 am. The alarm goes off. SpongeBob wakes up and looks at his shoes and they are still untied] Oh... No big deal. I'll remember sooner or later. [The scene changes to show the outside of the Pineapple and he opens the front door. He is shown wearing his Krusty Krab uniform.] 'Cause I'm ready! I'm... read... [takes a step and trips] ...y! [stands up] I'm read... [takes another step and trips] ...Ooh! [stands up] I'm read... [takes another step and trips] ... Uh! [stands up] I'm read... [takes another step and trips] ...Ooy! I'm read... Doy! I'm read... Doy! I'm read... Uh! I'm read... Doy! I'm read... Doy! I'm read... Duh! [repeats a few times]

speaker: [He makes it to the Krusty Krab where Patrick is eating a Krabby Patty. SpongeBob trips through the doors Patrick notices SpongeBob.]
Patrick
line: Oh, hi, SpongeBob.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [gasps] Oh, no! I can't let Patrick see I still haven't tied my shoes. [stands up and puts two holes through the floor with his feet]

speaker: Patrick
line: [Walks over to SpongeBob] Hey, SpongeBob... You're shorter. Have you been dieting?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, a sponge has to look his spongiest. [walks to the kitchen putting a line of holes in the floor with his feet] Well, I've gotta get to work. [opens kitchen door and plops on the floor, face first. He grunts. He talks muffled by the fact that he hasn't stood up yet and is talking straight into the floor.] Oh, barnacles! maybe I should just lay here.

speaker: Squidward
line: [peeks his head through the order window] Those patties aren't going to cook themselves, SpongeBob.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: He's right! Got to make... Krabby Patties! [he holds out a spatula and gets up] Laces or no laces! [crawls over to the grill while grunting] Ah... I just have to stand in this one spot. [makes a krabby patty] Ta-da! A perfect patty.

speaker: Squidward
line: Alright, SpongeBob, hand it over. Well?

speaker: [SpongeBob takes a deep breath. Then imagines that Squidward is really far away. He also imagines his shoe laces as snakes that squeeze him then the hallucination goes away.]
SpongeBob
line: Hey, Squidward, I've got an idea! How about you come get it?

speaker: Squidward
line: [Sarcastically] Oh, gee, SpongeBob, that's a great idea. And maybe I should cook the patties and do the dishes and wear square pants and live in a pineapple while you wait in the unemployment line!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No!

speaker: Squidward
line: Then bring that patty here now!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [Off-Screen] Okay, Squidward. [On-Screen] Here I come. I'm coming over. [scoots his feet across the floor inch by inch] I'm bringing the patty to you. Here comes the patty. No problem. I'm walking...the Krabby Patty...over to Squidward. All right, Squidward. I'm giving you the patty... For the hungry customer... So they can eat it... When I give it to you... Which is right... now. [holds out the patty but the scene zooms out to show that SpongeBob never moved]

speaker: Squidward
line: Uh, SpongeBob? I'm over here! Now move!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Okay, Squidward. [looks down at his feet] Just slowly move your leg. Walk over there... with the... [tries to take a step but trips himself and sends the patty flying through the air at Squidward] Dah!

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob! [the patty lands in his mouth]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I'm sorry, Squidward.

speaker: Squidward
line: [chewing the patty] SpongeBob!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I'll just make another... Doh! [makes another patty but trips again throwing the patty towards Squidward]

speaker: Squidward
line: Sponge... [patty enters his mouth]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hold it... Doy! [makes another patty and trips again sending the patty into Squidwards mouth again] Let me just... [makes another patty] Doy! [he trips again and launches another patty. This continues for a while. Pretty soon, Squid is extremely huge. A group of customers is standing at the register. Old Man Jenkins pokes him.]

speaker: Old Man Jenkins
line: What's the holdup?

speaker: Squidward
line: [Squidward turns around and burps really loudly] I think my heart just stopped. [customers complain] It's Sponge... [burps] ...Bob's fault! ['SpongeBob's fault' echoes in SpongeBob's head]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [He starts to tear up] I've failed. My career is over. I'm sorry, spatula. [puts down the spatula and takes his hat off] I'm sorry, hat. [puts it back on] I'm sorry, floor. [Takes a box of Krabby Patties from the wall and brings it to him and hugs it.] I am sorry, Krabby Patties. [lies in a puddle of tears. The scene changes to show Mr. Krabs on the toilet working on a crossword puzzle, all of the answers he has given is the word "Money".]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Let's see, a five-letter word for happiness. "Money." [laughs]

speaker: Customer
line: [Off-Screen] This is the worst service we've ever had! We're going to the Chum Bucket! [Mr. Krabs opens the bathroom door to see what the problem is]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Wait! Wait! Don't go! [his pants are on the ground]

speaker: Harold
line: Oh yeah, we are definitely out of here. [The costumers continue to complain. Mr. Krabs runs over to the door, his pants are still on the ground.]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Wait! Wait, don't go! That's me money walking out the door! What's the meaning of this, Mr. Squidward?

speaker: Squidward
line: It's SpongeBob's fault. [Mr. Krabs gets upset. His eyes turn into steamboat whistles]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: SpongeBob, get out here! [peeks out the kitchen door] More. [SpongeBob peeks out a little more] More. [SpongeBob stretches himself partially through the door] All the way, boy! [SpongeBob snaps out of the door and falls to the ground.] What be the matter, SpongeBob? I ought to make you walk the plank for this.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I'm sorry Mr. Krabs, it's just that I... I...

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Yes?

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Yes, yes, yes?

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Out with it, boy! [He shakes SpongeBob] What is it?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I forgot how to tie my shoes.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: [laughs] That's all?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: So you'll show me how?

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: I don't wear shoes. [SpongeBob gasps then runs over to Tom]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Could you show me how to tie my shoes?

speaker: Tom
line: Uh, fins? [points to his feet. SpongeBob runs to another customer]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Could you show me how to tie my shoes?

speaker: Eel
line: Well, I would, but, sadly, I am only an eel. [wiggles her tail in front of SpongeBob's face. SpongeBob runs to of the door to Jellyfish Fields]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [He talks to 3 Jellyfish] Could any of you show me how to tie my laces? [The Jellyfish sting him. The scene changes to show SpongeBob looking under a rock of 6 Sea Urchins] Could you, you, you, you, or you show me how to tie a knot? [The Sea Urchins run off. The Scene changes to SpongeBob looking at a creature in a cave] Could you show me how to tie a simple knot? [pair of eyes become multiple eyes and the monster eats SpongeBob. He notices a fisherman skeleton inside its mouth] Could you show me how to tie my shoes? [The monster shoots him out of its blow hole and onto the painting of Painty the Pirate] Could you show me how to tie my shoes?

speaker: Painty
line: Arr, I be just a painting of a head.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Doesn't anybody know how to tie a knot?! [lightning appears and it becomes night. The Flying Dutchman appears while laughing]

speaker: Flying Dutchman
line: Did somebody say knot?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [eyes are large. he shakes in fear and his nose goes down.] I did.

speaker: Flying Dutchman
line: So, you want to tie knots, do ya? Well, do ya?!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Yes, please, Mr. Flying Dutchman, sir.

speaker: Flying Dutchman
line: Then you've come to the right flying ghost, kid. You're looking at the first place winner in the fancy knottin' contest for the last 3,000 years!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hooray! [floats up into the air and turns into a heart]

speaker: Flying Dutchman
line: [grabs SpongeBob] You're gonna have to not do that. And stop staring at me with them big old eyes. [SpongeBob's eyes shrink] Now, stand back and watch me be knotty. [laughs and pulls out a rope] Haha! Behold! [rope is in pretzel shape] The pretzel knot!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Ooh... [Flying Dutchman makes the rope into 2 diamond shapes]

speaker: Flying Dutchman
line: The double diamond knot! [holds the rope, now in the shape of a square, in front of SpongeBob] The square knot! [He pulls it away and it slithers over and squeezes SpongeBob] The constrictor! [Grabs SpongeBob and pulls him apart revealing a knot that looks like intestines] The gut knot! [Flying Dutchman makes a knot in the shape of a pillow] The pillow knot. [turns the knot over where SpongeBob is sleeping wearing a purple sleeping cap. Then, the Flying Dutchman makes the knot into a butterfly] The butterfly knot. [It starts to flutter away]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Ooh...

speaker: Flying Dutchman
line: Wait, There's more! [SpongeBob takes out a pen and paper and his Jellyfishing glasses.] The monkey chain! [shows the rope as a chain] The monkey's fist! [shows the rope into a ball] The monkey! [shows the rope as a monkey]

speaker: Monkey Knot
line: Ooh, ooh!

speaker: Flying Dutchman
line: This one here's a loop knot, otherwise known as the 'poop loop'. [pulls the rope]

speaker: Rope
line: Poop!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [laughs] Those are great, Mr. Flying Dutchman, sir. Now can you show me how to tie my shoes?

speaker: Flying Dutchman
line: [laughs] I don't know how to tie me shoes. I haven't worn shoes for over 5,000 years! [He waves his tail around. He holds a sock with two blue stripes up] But sometimes I like to wear this little sock over me ghostly tail. [laughs as he flies off while lightning goes off. The scene changes SpongeBob crawling into his pineapple.]

speaker: Gary
line: Meow.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Not now, Gary.

speaker: Gary
line: Meow.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I'm not in the mood, Gary.

speaker: Gary
line: Meow. [The scene changes to SpongeBob's bedroom. Off-Screen] Meow.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [crawls into bed] Just leave me and me untied shoes alone, Gary [Gary roars knocking SpongeBob off the bed and onto the floor] Okay, Gary, you have my attention.

speaker: Gary
line: Meow. [ties SpongeBob's shoes]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [gasps] Gary! Well, I'll be! You can tie shoes! [Gary shows hes wearing shoes that look like old-style bowling shoes, under his shell] Hoppin' clams! How did you learn to do that? [Gary's shell opens revealing a record. The music starts and SpongeBob starts dancing.]

speaker: Narrator
line: Ah, beautiful springtime. A time for fun and frolic for most... [The scene cuts to the Krusty Krab, zooming in and then right at the front door. Squidward is there] but not for this poor slob. [Referring to Squidward]

speaker: Squidward
line: Oh, what a beautiful day. And here I am trapped in a prison of high cholesterol. [bell dings] No one ever comes in on Sunday. [bell dings again] Why can't Mr. Krabs just let us go home? [bell dings again. Squidward gets angry. The scene changes to to SpongeBob ringing a bell, set on the order window. Squidward runs up to SpongeBob] SpongeBob, stop ringing this bell! [He picks it up and slams it on the bottom of the order window]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I was just testing it. [Squidward leans through the order window getting in SpongeBob's face]

speaker: Squidward
line: I will ring the bell when there's an order. But... [scene zooms out to show that the restaurant is empty] ...there's no customers! There hasn't been one all day and there isn't gonna be any! [he struggles to pick up the cash register, but successfully does so and he slams it down making a bell noise]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: One Krabby Patty coming up!

speaker: Squidward
line: No!

speaker: [register drawer shoots open knocking Squidward out of the way. A bunch of coins fall onto the floor. The scene changes to show Mr. Krabs office where Mr. Krabs is writing something on a sheet of paper and he stops to hear the money dropping]
Mr. Krabs
line: That sounds like me money dropping. [The scene changes to show the outside of the office and Squidward is picking up the coins. Mr. Krabs opens his office door.] What's going on out here?! My babies! [runs up to Squidward and shoves him away] Get away, you barbarian! What have you done? Nice, clean money... soiled! [scoops up the coins in his claws] I'll take care of ya. Let papa clean ya up. [The scene changes to show a long shot of SpongeBob staring out from the order window] Clear the way! [he runs into the kitchen and starts washing them off in the sink] No, no, no, don't cry, little ones.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What's wrong, Mr. Krabs? [Mr. Krabs gets scared and throws the dimes in the air]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: [a dime rolls into the sink but does not go down the drain.] Me dime!  [Mr. Krabs gives a sigh of relief. Then the dime jumps, winks, and goes down the drain] No! [grabs the dime in the drain] I got it, boy. [tries to take his hand out] What the? It's stuck! You gotta help me, SpongeBob!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You've gotta let go of the dime.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: I can think of ten good reasons to never let go of a dime, boy. There's got to be another way! Grab me captain's quarters and heave! [SpongeBob pulls on Mr. Krabs from behind a couple times until Mr. Krabs gets thrown back without his arms] Me arms!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh no, not again! [Mr. Krabs hits the wall which makes the shelf slant and drop a pot, a glass, a pan, a mug, a treasure chest, an anchor, a buoy, and a scuba suit on Mr. Krabs' head. A giant bump rises up on Mr. Krabs' head and then a dime falls on it causing Mr. Krabs to fall over and blacken out. Scene changes to show an ambulance outside the Krusty Krab and two paramedics start to carry out Mr. Krabs on a stretcher.]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Wait. [The paramedics stop moving] Squidward... I'm putting you in charge of things around here while I'm gone.

speaker: Squidward
line: [smiles] You can count on me, sir! [The paramedics continue to carry Mr. Krabs out. A third paramedic carries out Mr. Krabs' arms] Take care, Hurry back. Get well soon. You're in our thoughts. [The final paramedic enters the ambulance and it drives off.] Takes more muscles to frown than to smile. [shuts the door] Okay, SpongeBob, let's get down to business. My first official act as new manager is to give you a promotion.

speaker: [SpongeBob's pupils form into stars to stars]
SpongeBob
line: [screams] Ahh! Really?

speaker: Squidward
line: You get to run the cash register.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: The cash register... Wow! Squidward, who's gonna work the grill?

speaker: Squidward
line: You are-- It's part of the promotion I mentioned earlier. You'll be wearing two hats now. You're gonna take the orders and then you're gonna make them! [puts his hat next to SpongeBob's hat]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Ah... This is the best day of my life.

speaker: Squidward
line: Me, too.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But wait, if I'm running the register and the grill, what are you gonna do?

speaker: Squidward
line: I've got some very important boss-like errands to run. See ya later. [he runs off]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Squidward!

speaker: Squidward
line: [He is half-way out the door] What is it?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You forgot to teach me how to use... The cash register. [He rubs the cash register]

speaker: Squidward
line: You push the button and put the money inside. Okay, you're on your own. [walks off as SpongeBob hugs the cash register]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I can't believe this is really happening. [sits on the cash register box. He starts to tear up.] Today, I start living!

speaker: [The scene changes to show Squidward walking outside]
Squidward
line: Well, Squidward, you've really outdone yourself this time. A beautiful day of relaxing and pampering... With pay. Hmm... I guess I do kinda feel bad for poor little SpongeBob, all by his lonesome... Oh, oh, it'll pass. He's probably just standing at the register with that stupid grin on his face. [scene cuts to Squidward's imagination Patrick and SpongeBob in the Krusty Krab with dopey looks on their faces]

speaker: Thought Patrick
line: Hey, SpongeBob!

speaker: Thought SpongeBob
line: Hey, Patrick!

speaker: Thought Patrick
line: Hey, SpongeBob could you give me change for a quarter? [holds up quarter]

speaker: Thought SpongeBob
line: No problem! [takes quarter, bangs on the register until it opens, and gives Patrick a giant pile of money] Here ya go!

speaker: Thought Patrick
line: Thanks.

speaker: Squidward
line: [gasps] I forgot to tell him how to make change! Oh! [he runs back to the restaurant, banging the doors open] Sponge... [sees only SpongeBob in the Krusty Krab] ...Bob. [checks the cash register to see if everything is still there. Gives a sigh of relief]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hi, Squidward. All done with those errands?

speaker: Squidward
line: No, I am not. I just remembered I needed change for this dollar. [He pulls out a dollar from his pocket]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Do you want four quarters? [holds up four quarters] Or ten dimes? [shows ten dimes on his left hand] Or twenty nickels? [shows ten nickels on each arm] Or one hundred pennies? [shows one-hundred pennies on his back] Or one quarter, three dimes, seven nickels, and ten pennies? [shows the quarter on his nose, 3 dimes on his fingers, 7 nickels on his thumb, and ten pennies, in the shape of the cent symbol, on his foot] Or, if you give me a five dollar bill, your options are...

speaker: Squidward
line: Alright, goodbye. [walks off. Scene changes to show Squidward's house where he comes out wearing sunglasses and blue shorts or bathing suit, he is carrying a lawn chair, a sunbathing mirror, an umbrella hat and a bottle of sunscreen.] This is great. My day off, no worries, just relaxation. [sets his lawn chair down, puts the hat on, puts the mirror down, and puts sunscreen on his nose.] I'm the boss, I deserve this. Ah...

speaker: Squidward
line: [voice over/Thoughts] Everything will be fine. There won't be any customers today anyway. He'll probably just stand there, bored. [imagines SpongeBob behind the counter just standing there. Squidward chuckles.] SpongeBob, bored. [he chuckles some more]

speaker: Thought SpongeBob
line: Ehh... Gettin' kinda bored. [yawns and falls asleep snoring. Krusty Krab spontaneously combusts and Squidward tries to blow it out but its a thought bubble, so it goes away. Begins to run to the Krusty Krab but stops.]

speaker: Squidward
line: Oh, what am I doing? [he pulls out a pocket watch] I am wasting valuable relaxing time, that's what I'm doing! I mean, really. What are the odds? SpongeBob setting the Krusty Krab on fire. [he walks back down the road, chuckling. Then, a fire truck drives down the road from to direction of the Krusty Krab. Squidward is startled and runs to the restaurant with a fire extinguisher. He opens the door and sprays the galley with foam. As the foam subsides, Squidward, now with a foam beard, walks over to SpongeBob, who has a foam mustache]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: May I help you, sir?

speaker: Squidward
line: [wipes off his foamy beard] It's me, you dunce!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh, hi, Squidward! [mustache falls off] How are those errands going?

speaker: Squidward
line: What's that supposed to mean? I'm very busy.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, I'm sure you are.

speaker: Squidward
line: I don't like your tone.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [high-pitched voice] I'm sure you are. [normal voice again] How's that?

speaker: Squidward
line: Just do your jobs! [walks off]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Aye-aye, Mr. Tentacles. [puts the spatula in his forehead. Squidward leaves, grumbling.] Boy, no wonder Mr. Krabs put him in charge. [The scene changes to show Squidward's house. The scene zooms into the interior. Squidward is trying to sit down.]

speaker: Squidward
line: Must... re... [cracks his back] ...lax! [He slouches in his chair. He pulls out a hand mirror] Look at yourself. You're losing your bluish glow. Stop worrying so much. Now, repeat after me. You will not go back to the Krusty Krab. [his reflection turns into SpongeBob]

speaker: Mirror SpongeBob
line: I will destroy the Krusty Krab! [Squidward screams and throws the mirror at the wall and runs to the Krusty Krab]

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Have you finished...?

speaker: Squidward
line: No! [walks out] That's it. That's it. No matter what sick fantasies run through my mind, I will not go back to that restaurant! [walks into his house then runs out towards the Krusty Krab]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Have you finished those errands? [Squidward runs back to his house then back to the Krusty Krab] Have you finished those errands? [Squidward runs back to his house] Have you finished those errands? [Squidward runs to the Krusty Krab] Have you finished those errands? [Squidward keeps running back and forth while SpongeBob is repeating 'have you finished those errands?' Finally, Squidward enters the Krusty Krab and stops] Have you finished those errands? Have you finished those errands? Have you finished those errands?

speaker: Squidward
line: No, I am not finished with those errands and I never will be. So quit checking up on me! [walks up to SpongeBob] I know what you're up to. [He hits the cash register while he talks] Forcing me to come back here every time you mess up!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But I haven't...

speaker: Squidward
line: Okay, [He leans on the cash register] maybe you haven't messed up yet, but you will. You will... [walks backwards] And when you do, I'll be there. I'll be there! [He laughs and runs away.]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Gosh, Squidward sure is a hard worker. He makes me proud to wear these hats.

speaker: [The scene changes to show Squidward putting locks on his door, bolting it down with wood and nails, putting police tape up, and using a blowtorch to weld the door shut so he can't get out]
Squidward
line: There! [He throws the blowtorch backwards] Now I'll have to stay here and enjoy myself! [His face looks weird] I'm not even gonna think about you-know-who at the you-know-what doing I-don't-care. [laughs] Just gonna... Relax. [He walks to his shower and turns on the water and puts on his bathing cap sits in his bathtub] Let Squid's day off...[Under the bath water] begin. [Squidward hears SpongeBob laughing] [above the bath water] What was that? [SpongeBob's laughing is heard again] It's SpongeBob. He's spying on me, to see if I'm really doing errands. [gives a chuckle] But, but he left his post. [Gives another chuckle] And I've finally caught him messing up. [Gives another chuckle. He pokes his head out the window.] Aha! I caught you, Sponge... [notices that its only the wind making a branch of coral brush against his house] ... Branch. [Squidward notices SpongeBob's silhouette with his two hats behind his shower curtain] Heh, here's that rubber duck Mr. Krabs wanted me to get. [pulls the curtain aside] I've got you now! Wait'll Mr. Krabs finds out you're a... [Sees his toilet with a shampoo bottle and 2 rolls of toilet paper on it] ... Toilet. You're losin' it, Squidward. Calm down. If I let this get to me again, I'll just end up running down to the Krusty Krab, bursting through the front door, up to that yellow headache SpongeBob, and he'll say...

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hi, Squidward. [SpongeBob is in the bathtub with Squidward.] Are you finished with those errands yet? [goes under the water]

speaker: Squidward
line: Aha! [goes under the water and appears as a real octopus] I know you're in here. [gasps] What? [SpongeBob is in the drain. He winks and goes down] He's heading back to the Krusty Krab! I'll beat him there! [slams through the locked door with nothing on but his shower cap and bubbles foaming around his waist] I've got you now, SpongeBob!

speaker: Sadie
line: [covers her son's eyes with her hand] Hey, put some clothes on!

speaker: Squidward
line: [runs past Patrick lying on a rock] The truth will be revealed!

speaker: Patrick
line: [stands up] Whoa-ho, right on, Squidward! [The scene changes to show the hospital where Purple Doctorfish and Mr. Krabs are walking out]

speaker: Purple Doctorfish
line: Okay, Mr. Krabs. Get plenty of rest and if things don't seem right, come back. [walks inside]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Thanks, Doc. [Squidward runs past him]

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob, you can't beat me! [Mr. Krabs' arms fall off and he walks back into the hospital. The Scene changes to show Squidward running into the Krusty Krab while laughing hysterically.] Aha! I caught you now! You didn't think I knew you were a stick outside my window! Ha! [SpongeBob looks confused] Or the toilet in my bathroom! And then you were in my bathtub, and I... And-and you... And I... And then you... Swam... Down the drain and... Beat me... to the Krusty... Krab.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Uh, does that mean you're...? [Squidward covers SpongeBob's mouth with his hand]

speaker: Squidward
line: Yes, SpongeBob. I am finished with those errands. [hugs the register] I guess I want to take my place back at the cash register. I really do.

speaker: [He rubs his face on the cash register. SpongeBob takes off his clothes (except his underwear) and hands them to Squidward]
SpongeBob
line: Then you might wanna put these on. [Squidward looks down and notices a bunch of bubbles. They all pop, he grabs SpongeBob's pants and puts them on.] Hmm... Hey, Squidward, you know what? Look! [walks back with the "open"/"closed" sign] We forgot to switch the "Closed" sign to "Open". [flips the sign from "Closed" to "Open"]. It's almost like we could've taken the whole day off! [He laughs. Squidward's nose falls off and his head deflates. His whole body soon falls gently to the ground.]

speaker: [The exterior of SpongeBob's pineapple is shown. The scene zooms into the interior of the pineapple, SpongeBob's bed room. His alarm clock goes off. SpongeBob gets up, still in his tighty-whities, puts his blanket on like a cape, and uses the wind of the alarm clock to "fly" at his big calendar. He lands on the 20th day, which is a Sunday]
SpongeBob
line: Wow, it's Sunday, Gary! Guess what's for breakfast?

speaker: Gary
line: Meow.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [The scene changes to show the two his kitchen. SpongeBob opens the door.] That's right! [puts a bowl on the kitchen counter] A sundae! [runs to the freezer and finds it empty] Whoops... Looks like we're out of ice cream. Guess I'll have to use something else... Ketchup! [Runs back to the bowl with a big bottle of Ketchup. He squeezes a bunch of ketchup into the bowl. He runs over to a cupboard] Hmmm... Bananas... Cherries... Boring. [closes cupboard door] Ah, here we go! Onions! [runs up to the counter with two sacks that say "onions" on them] Ready, Gary?

speaker: Gary
line: Meow. [Plays a violin while SpongeBob cries while peeling the onions into the bowl]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Just one more thing! Pea... [opens up another cupboard but finds an empty jar] ...nuts. Gary! [He walks over to Gary while shaking the empty jar] Our peanuts jar is totally empty! [Gary burps] Hmmm... [snaps fingers] Wait! I know one other place we can find peanuts. [looks in the bathroom and finds a peanut plant in front of the window] Good thing I still have these peanut plants growing in the windowsill. [throws the plant into the sundae bowl] A little texture never hurt. There we go. [gets out a spoon] This sundae's gonna taste great! [He turns around] Aren't you going to help me, Gary? Gary? Oh, well. More for me! [takes a few spoonfuls. Scene cuts to SpongeBob coming out of the kitchen with a bunch of stink coming out with him. He drops his spoon while Gary hides behind a coral plant] You know what they say, Gary. I'm easy like Sunday morning. ["morning" comes out of SpongeBob's mouth and wraps itself around Gary's eyes, twisting them. The scene changes to show SpongeBob outside his house] Okay, let's see my to-do list. [takes out a big long list] Go to work, go to work, go to work, go to work, go to work.. [his list "droops"]wait, that's not right. I need the one for Sunday. [takes out a small piece of paper] Ah, here we go. 'Say hi to everyone in Bikini Bottom'. [runs off. Scene cuts to SpongeBob running up to a citizen] Hello. [citizen runs off in disgust of his bad breath. SpongeBob waves] Some people are even late on Sunday. [SpongeBob notices a mailman] Hi, mailfish! [mailman breaks his skin into a smaller fish and then into another smaller fish. SpongeBob notices a crossing guard] Hi, Mrs. Crossing Guard! [crossing guard gets a whiff of his bad breath]

speaker: Mrs. Crossing Guard
line: Mother of mercy! [children walk across the street and then the sound of a crashing car sounds but its revealed to actually be a parade]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Wow! A parade! Hi, parade! [the band stops] Hi tuba player, hi drummer, hi guy with the cymbals, hi trumpeter, hi tambourine girl, hi timbale man, hi didgeridoo player, [didgeridoo player wears a big skirt, hat, sunglasses] hi triangle player, hi guy with the kettle drum, hi pianist, hi guy with the flute. And heeelllooo, Dolly! [the stench ball rolls down the street, knocking the band out like a bunch of bowling pins and scattering them about. They all run out wailing in pain and disgust. The whole town is soon deserted]

speaker: Fish bands
line: My leg! My leg! [they all run away from the stench]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Was it something I said? [he walks down the street] Something weird is going on today. Everyone is running away from me. And now... [he notices a giant pink wad on a bench] ...giant piles of bubble gum?! Oh, what next? [Patrick's head pops out from it]

speaker: Patrick
line: Hi, SpongeBob. [his appendages form from the wad]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh, hi, Patrick. I'm confused.

speaker: Patrick
line: Yes, I am.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick, everyone is running away from me. Watch. [he walks over to a building] Hi, building! [the stench bounces off the building, and it slowly moves away. SpongeBob walks back to Patrick] I just don't get it.

speaker: [the stench goes toward Patrick, but bounces off him, as he has no nose]
Patrick
line: I don't either. Maybe it's the way you're dressed. [pan up slowly at SpongeBob's clothes, looking fancy]

speaker: Both
line: Nah.

speaker: Patrick
line: Maybe it's your voice. [SpongeBob laughs  for an extended time, then stops]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Good one, Patrick.

speaker: Patrick
line: Well, maybe it's just because you're ugly.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Ugly? [he puts a finger in his mouth, wipes his forehead with it, then strikes a pose. A spotlight goes off] You gotta be kiddin' me..

speaker: Patrick
line: Better try the reflection test. [he pulls out a large mirror]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [to his reflection] Hi. [the stench hits his reflection, and the reflection takes a hammer and breaks the mirror. Pat peeks through it]

speaker: Patrick
line: Ugly.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh no! I can't be ugly! I can't be! I can't be ugly! [he runs up to a couple] Am I ugly? [the two catch a whiff on the stench. The husband pulls down a hook, the two bites down on it and the hook is reeled in. SpongeBob runs off and latches onto a car's windshield] Am I ugly? [the stench goes around the glass and hits the woman]

speaker: Driver
line: My eyes!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oof I'm ugly... [cut to night at SpongeBob's house. Lightning strikes repeatedly as Patrick walks in]

speaker: Patrick
line: SpongeBob, can I borrow some bath beads? [he walks through the dark house. He opens the library door. It's pitch dark, except for a light from the fire. SpongeBob mournfully plays Phantom of the Opera-style organ music. Patrick walks up to him, and he stops playing] SpongeBob? [the lights go on, and SpongeBob turns. He's wearing a Groucho Marx-esque nose and glasses, and a dark cape. He turns his back to Patrick]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Go. Run away like all the others. No one would want a friend as ugly as I am. [he hits down on the organ]

speaker: Patrick
line: Sure they would! It makes them feel better about the way they look! Maybe a story will cheer you up. [he picks SpongeBob up, without glasses or cape, up and puts him in his comfy chair] It's called, 'The Ugly Barnacle.' [SpongeBob listens attentively] Once there was an ugly barnacle. He was so ugly that everyone died! The end. [Patrick grins, oblivious to his story's bad message]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: That didn't help at all. [he starts sobbing] How long? How long have I been ugly, Patrick?

speaker: Patrick
line: As long as I can remember. You poor ugly thing, you. [SpongeBob clings on Patrick]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Help me! I'm so ashamed! I'm spiraling! I'm spiraling! [Patrick smacks SpongeBob in the face, twisting his head around] Thanks Patrick. [Patrick holds his hand up again, and SpongeBob stops him, stammering] It's okay, Patrick. Spiraling, over.

speaker: Patrick
line: Just do what I do when I have problems. [screaming] Scream! [SpongeBob is covered with spit from Patrick. Patrick grabs SpongeBob and runs off] Come on buddy I'll help you. [cut to SpongeBob and Patrick on the roof] Okay now, say it. [SpongeBob hesitates] Say it.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I can't.

speaker: Patrick
line: SpongeBob, you're never going to feel better unless you get this thing off your chest. [we see SpongeBob has a alien-like leach sucking on his chest]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I know, Patrick. [he pulls it off and throws it aside]

speaker: Patrick
line: Say it. Say it.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I'm ugly.

speaker: Patrick
line: You're ugly and what...?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Square?

speaker: Patrick
line: No. Proud.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I'm ugly and I'm proud.

speaker: Patrick
line: Good! Say it louder.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [louder] I'm ugly and I'm proud.

speaker: Patrick
line: Louder.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [louder] I'm ugly and I'm proud.

speaker: Patrick
line: Louder!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [yelling] I'm ugly and I'm proud! [pan over to Squidward's roof, where he's tanning] I'm ugly and I'm proud! I'm ugly and I'm proud!

speaker: Squidward
line: Is that what he calls it? [SpongeBob is breathing heavily]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: That felt great! I feel empowered.

speaker: Patrick
line: So whaddya wanna do now?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I don't know. How about a movie? [cut to 'The Reef' movie theater. SpongeBob and Patrick walk into a crowded theater. The two go down the front row] Pardon me. Ugly Sponge coming through. [two fish smell SpongeBob's breath, their pupils turn to crosses, and they float upward]

speaker: Patrick
line: People respect self esteem. [he and SpongeBob sit down in the two now empty seats. SpongeBob leans over to a woman sitting next to him]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hi. I am very ugly. But you should enjoy the movie anyway. [the stench burns the woman's eyes, complexion, and hair off, and her head is now all charred. SpongeBob leans over Patrick to the man beside Patrick, who is a blue version of Fred] Excuse me, sir. I hope my horrible ugliness won't be a distraction to you.

speaker: Fred
line: Not at all, boy. [Smells SpongeBob's bad breath. Makes a sourly disgusted expression, screams out a disgusted noise, and then quickly runs away]

speaker: Patrick
line: [to SpongeBob] Don't worry about him, SpongeBob. He's just a- [he notices his friend crying] SpongeBob? SpongeBob, what's wrong?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [sobbing]I can't do this, Patrick! I've tried, and I've tried, [he turns around, revealing an extremely deflated face] but I'm not always as confident as I look. Maybe I'd better just go back and hide. [Patrick goes from sad to angry]

speaker: Patrick
line: [loudly] What is wrong with you people?! [he stands up] Afraid to look ugliness in the face? [he picks up SpongeBob] Well, here! Look at it! [the stench pours into the audience] It's ugly, isn't it?! [he points SpongeBob at five people] You look at it!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hello.

speaker: [The fish run off. Patrick points SpongeBob at a larger group of people]
Patrick
line: You look at it!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hi.

speaker: Patrick
line: [points SpongeBob at the whole audience] Look at it! [the entire room empties out] Look at it! Look at it! Look at it! I want all of you to look at it!

speaker: [Everybody screams in terror and they all run out of the theater in a panic. Patrick and SpongeBob are all alone in the theater]
SpongeBob
line: They all ran away, Patrick.

speaker: Patrick
line: I bet there's no line at the snack bar. [cut to the snack bar. Patrick leans over the counter] Hello...? Hello...? They must be on break.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh, wait, Patrick! I just remembered. [he reaches in his pocket and pulls out some of his sundae] I've got some of my peanut-onion sundae we can share!

speaker: [The fume of it floats past Patrick, burning off his eyebrows]
Patrick
line: That looks great! [closes his mouth on SpongeBob's hand, and sucks out the sundae. Patrick sighs with relief, but he starts to feel funny, His stomach makes engine spluttering noises] Oh, I gotta go to the restroom! [he runs off. Cut to the bathroom, where Patrick and Martin their hands at the sink] I'm out of soap, can I borrow-
[the stench reaches the guy]

speaker: Martin
line: Stay back!

speaker: Patrick
line: I just want some-

speaker: Martin
line: Here! Here's my money! [he drops it] Take it! Take it and go away!

speaker: Patrick
line: My hands aren't that dirty... [he walks over to a line of three fish waiting at a stall] Hey, you guys want to hear a bathroom joke?

speaker: [Patrick's breath reaches the fish and they make disgusted noises.]
Indignant Fish
line: You tryin' to kill us?!

speaker: [The fish walk out murmuring. Patrick looks in the mirror.]
Patrick
line: [In shock] Oh... Oh! I caught the ugly!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick, is everything okay in here? [he hears Patrick sobbing. He opens a stall door and sees Patrick sitting on the toilet with a bag over his head] What are you doing in there, Patrick?

speaker: Patrick
line: Wouldn't you like to know?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: And why is that bag on your head?

speaker: Patrick
line: Why? Oh, no reason. Except you gave me the ugly! [he whips the bag off. SpongeBob recoils and gasps. Patrick walks out] What am I gonna do? I can't go out looking like this!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Just remember what we talked about. There's power in pride.

speaker: Patrick
line: That may be fine for you, but I was one of the beautiful people. Now look at me! [his breath reaches SpongeBob and he holds his nose in disgust] I'm almost as ugly as you! I always thought if I was as ugly as that guy, I don't know what I'd do.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick...?

speaker: Patrick
line: What's my mom gonna say?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [plugging his nose] Patrick?

speaker: Patrick
line: Oh my gosh, if my sister finds out, wait, I don't have a sister, if the bank, I mean it's one thing if you have bad shoes, or even bad hair, but... [SpongeBob screams at Patrick]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick!  You're not ugly. Your breath stinks. Really bad. [Patrick sighs with relief, his stench in the shape of a skull and crossbones]

speaker: Patrick
line: Ahhhhhhhh, what a relief...

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [his eyes water from the foul smell] Arrgh, barnacles, Patrick! What did you eat?!

speaker: Patrick
line: Oh, some roast beef, some chicken, a pizza...

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No, I mean just this morning.

speaker: Patrick
line: Some roast beef, some chicken, a pizza...

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What else?

speaker: Patrick
line: Well, I had some of your sundae.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sundae... [he whips what's remaining of it out] Patrick! My sundae gave us rancid breath!

speaker: Patrick
line: Whatcha mean? [SpongeBob coughs as Patrick's breath flies by him]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I mean, we're not ugly, we just stink!

speaker: Patrick
line: Stink? [the two cheer and run around in circles chanting]

speaker: Both
line: We stink! We stink! We stink! We stink! We stink! We stink!

speaker: [The fumes encompass the entire theater and it dissolves to the ground. SpongeBob and Patrick run out and run up to Squidward, who is looking through the window of a wig shop]
SpongeBob
line: Oh, guess what, Squidward?

speaker: Both
line: We stink! [the two hug Squidward, and then run off, still cheering] We're smelly! I reek! Smell me! [the two run off until they're out of sight]

speaker: [At the Krusty Krab, Squidward is at the ordering boat and SpongeBob looking out from the ordering window. Mr. Krabs' voice sounds on the P.A]
Mr. Krabs
line: Attention! Attention! All Krusty Krew employees, attention! [Mr. Krabs is standing next to them, speaking into a megaphone] Get the anchors out of your pants and report to me office! [pause] That will be all. [Squidward and SpongeBob follow Mr. Krabs into his office and sit down] I have an important announcement to make.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Woo! Hooray! [SpongeBob jumps up on top of the chair and twirls it around] The new spatulas are here!

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Sit down, boy! There's no new spatulas!

speaker: Squidward
line: [sarcastically] How disappointing.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: You may know me daughter Pearl. She's growing up fast. [he looks at a picture of Pearl and Mr. Krabs in swim attire jumping up from the water] It seems like it was just yesterday I was teaching her how to breach. Me mammalian angel. Oh... [puts the picture back on the wall] Anyway, uh, so she's going to be working here during her summer vacation. She's got a lot of fresh ideas to bring in some hungry customers! [a bell rings]

speaker: Pearl
line: [off-screen] Hello? Daddy?

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Thar she blows! [Mr. Krabs leaves the room]

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob, do you realize what this means?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No new spatulas?

speaker: Squidward
line: No! It means some bratty teenager's coming in here to tell us what to do. We can't have that! We have seniority, right?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Right! [SpongeBob and Squidward shake hands]

speaker: Squidward
line: So, we'll work together to protect our pathetic positions.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Okey-dokey, Squidward. And then we'll get those new spatulas!

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: [Mr. Krabs' head pokes into the office] All right, men. [SpongeBob and Squidward walk out of the office] Say hello to me Pearl.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hello, pole. [SpongeBob hugs one of the giant pillars]

speaker: Pearl
line: [holding a box] Hi guys.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: It makes me jolly as a roger to have you finally aboard the family business!

speaker: Pearl
line: Great dad, because I have so many new ideas.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: [Mr. Krabs sniffs the air and his eyes conjoin to make a dollar sign shape] I can smell the money already! I'll be in me office if you need me! [walks off]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What's in the box?

speaker: Pearl
line: It's a surprise.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I like surprises.

speaker: Pearl
line: Great, then close your eyes.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob covers his eyes with his hands] I'm ready! [Pearl puts the box's open end over SpongeBob]

speaker: Squidward
line: Well, I like it so far.

speaker: Pearl
line: [Pearl lifts up the box] Ta-daaaaaaaaaaa... [Squidward gasps. The body suit is pink with purple flowers and on the top are two K's being held up by springs] It's the new Krusty Krew uniform. I designed it myself. [Pearl hands SpongeBob a mirror]

speaker: Squidward
line: Okay, this is it, SpongeBob. Now tell her how you really feel about that uniform.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Okay, Squidward. [he winks to him] Pearl... this is the greatest uniform ever!

speaker: Squidward
line: Fish paste.

speaker: Pearl
line: Oh SpongeBob, you look so adorable. I could just eat you up.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sorry Pearl, but this item's not on the menu! [giggles]

speaker: Squidward
line: Well, I didn't think it was possible SpongeBob, but you look even more ridiculous than usual.

speaker: Pearl
line: Don't feel jealous, Uncle Squiddy. I made one for you too. [she holds up his uniform]

speaker: Squidward
line: Don't bother, only a fool would wear that.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: [Mr. Krabs bursts out of his office, wearing the uniform] Avast, ye shipmates! Don't these just shiver your timbers? [laughs, then shuts the door. Krabs peeks his head out] Get that suit on, sailor. It's already been paid for.

speaker: Squidward
line: [with the uniform on. The two springs give and the K's fall over Squid's eyes] Rage. Fury. Irritation. Humiliation.

speaker: Pearl
line: Squidward is such a barnacle.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: A stick in the sand.

speaker: Pearl
line: But not you, SpongeBob. You are full of style.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Me? Really?

speaker: Pearl
line: Totally, S.B. You ooze fashion. And I've got some completely coral concepts for this old joint, and I'm going to need someone with your kind of talent to help me.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, I have been trying to get Mr. Krabs to make a few changes around here. [he looks at a picture he drew of Mr. Krabs, himself and Squidward with mustaches]

speaker: Pearl
line: Why, with my girlish instincts and your um... sponginess, [cut to a view of the Krusty Krab as a deserted place, where a skeleton is sitting at a table] we'll turn this worn-out lunch wagon into a teenage paradise.

speaker: Pearl
line: [cut to Pearl with a notepad, thinking] SpongeBob, what do you like better? The Kutie Krab or the Kooky Krab?

speaker: Squidward
line: [Squidward runs over] For what, dare I ask?

speaker: Pearl
line: Our new name for our new look. I mean, "The Krusty Krab" has got to go. Who wants to eat at a place they think is crusty? Bleh! [she points the pencil towards her open mouth, to show disgust]

speaker: Squidward
line: Well, sure it's a terrible name, but this is a terrible place. Therefore, the name should be left alone. Right, SpongeBob?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I got it! How about The Kayate Krab?

speaker: Pearl
line: Hmm... how about The Kissy Krab? [puckers up lips and makes kissing noises]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob is now in royal attire] The King Krab?

speaker: Pearl
line: [Pearl holds up a lollipop, which bears an odd resemblance to her father] The Kandy Krab!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob dressed as a jazzy beatnik] The Kool Krab. [dresses as a cowboy riding a stick horse] Or the Kowboy Krab! [appears totally stretched out] The Kurly Krab. [appears as a mad scientist holding a brain with Mr. Krabs-like arms coming from it] The Kreepy Krab. [Appears as a crazy killer jungle man with a loincloth. Shouts scarily.] The Killer Krab!

speaker: Pearl
line: [freaked out] Aaah! No!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You're right, too scary. [they both think and finally get the name and hug]

speaker: SpongeBob and Pearl
line: The Kuddly Krab! [Both happily hug and laugh. A rainbow of colors fills the screen. Pearl, SpongeBob and an anguished Squidward stand outside the new restaurant. The sign for the restaurant is now a heart and a cutesy robot Krabs is waving his arms atop it. The restaurant outside itself is tie-dyed with colors and rainbows and the flags are now hearts. Balloons are hanging from the roof and giant lollipops come from the chimney. Pearl and SpongeBob, giggling, walk back in the restaurant. Squid is so mad that the two K's on his uniform catch on fire and he shakes the pole. Millie and Fred drive by in a car]

speaker: Millie
line: It's a shame old man Krabs sold the Krusty Krab.

speaker: Fred
line: That's a darn shame. Hey, lady! Do you know where we can get something to eat around here?

speaker: Squidward
line: That's it! I quit! [he rips off his uniform, revealing nothing under it. A police whistle is blown and a cop comes over. He writes him a ticket and places it between his legs. Inside the restaurant, it's a total makeover, like Pearl said before, it's a teenage paradise]

speaker: Shelia
line: Finally! A cool place for teens to just, you know, hang out! [Pearl and SpongeBob marvel at their makeover]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Pearl, you're a genius. All these young, hip new customers. Phooey on Squidward. He can't keep up with the times. You're a true visionary, Pearl.

speaker: Pearl
line: Thank you, SpongeBob. I do have 20/20 vision. [blinks bashfully]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, hip people have to eat too. Back to the grill. [SpongeBob is in the kitchen at the grill] The customers may be hot but my grill is hotter. [he pushes his spatula on the grill and imitates a sizzle]

speaker: Pearl
line: [Pearl is in the ordering window to hand SpongeBob an order] SpongeBob, order up!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Two... sa-lads. Never heard of it. I got to stay hip. I don't want to end up like silly old Squidward. But what in the name of Davy Jones' locker is a [pronounces it wrong] sa-lad? [cut to SpongeBob walking up to Pearl with a tray with two Krabby Patties] Here you go. Two sa-lads.

speaker: Pearl
line: Ew, gross. Those aren't salads. Take those back. Remove the bun, the patty and the condiments.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But that just leaves the lettuce and the tomato.

speaker: Pearl
line: Exactly.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: All right. [walks back to the kitchen and sadly removes the top bun] Okay, no buns. That's hip. [removes the bottom bun] No patties [removes the patty] happenin.' [crushed] Oh yeah, that's definitely the coolest meal I've ever saw.

speaker: Nazz
line: This is so cool!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob walks over with a tray of salads to Nazz and Nancy at a table, who are talking] Two salads. [he drops the tray on the table and walks back to the kitchen] That was awful. I hope I never have to tear apart a perfectly good Krabby Patty ever again. I don't think my heart can take it. [he screams, noticing the grill is gone] Where's the grill?

speaker: Pearl
line: Come on SpongeBob, you're a hip guy. You know that fried foods are O-U-T, out!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Uh... right on.

speaker: Pearl
line: Check out this new menu I came up with. [SpongeBob takes the menu]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [reading it] Salad and tea. But where are the Krabby Patties?

speaker: Pearl
line: Silly, those aren't hip. And you won't be needing that thing anymore. [takes the spatula from SpongeBob. He starts to stutter] I've got something more fun for you to do anyway. [cut to SpongeBob outside the restaurant in a crab suit, waving at cars. One car with Gus stops]

speaker: Gus
line: Hey buddy, you need a ride? I was just on my way to the big doofus convention! [laughs and drives off]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: This is humiliating. I'm a fry cook, darn it! You can take away my spatula, but when you take away my dignity, that's when I get mad! I'm going to march right up to Mr. Krabs' office and tell him this is just too much! [he walks toward the restaurant, but gravity gets the best of him and he falls over. He struggles to get up and starts to whimper. Cut to Sponge at Mr. Krabs' door, outside the costume] Okay SpongeBob, you can do this. Come on... [he knocks on the door and peeks in] Mr. Krabs, can I talk to you? [Mr. Krabs' office is just as elaborately decorated as the rest of the restaurant]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Come on in, me boy! Have a seat.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Thanks, Mr. Krabs. [he sits down in a bear bean bag chair, but starts to sink inside it]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Don't you just love me new office? Pearly designed it for me.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob has sunk in, now you can only see his eye] Mr. Krabs, um, I think we have a problem.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Isn't that the neatest $40 chair you ever sat in?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob has totally sunk into the chair and he sticks out his hand] Sure Mr. Krabs, but I've got some bad news.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: How about my cuddly executive buddy? [picks up a blue stress-relief doll] Reduces stress for only five easy payments of $9.95. [Krabs squeezes it and its eyes, nose and ears pop out]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob pops out of the chair] Mr. Krabs, Pearl is ruining the Krusty Krab! [he covers his mouth]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: What?! Why, Pearl is saving the Krusty Krab! I mean, the Kuddly Krab. [goes over to a picture of a seahorse] What would we do without these beautiful $20 sea unicorn wall hangers? [goes to a strand of lights] How could we ever survive without these $35 heart lights? How could we go on without a sea fern on every last table?! [holds one up] It's hip! It's coral! It's... it's losing money! [starts to cry] Oh you're right SpongeBob. But I can't fire me pride and joy, it'll break her fragile little heart! What am I going to do?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: There there, Mr. Krabs. I'm sure there's another way.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: That's it boy!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What's it?

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: You could fire her! It's ok if she hates you.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: That's not what I said, sir. [Mr. Krabs brings SpongeBob to the door]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Great then, it's all settled you fire Pearly, I'll wait in me office. [SpongeBob is pushed out the door and accidentally runs into Pearl]

speaker: Pearl
line: Totally rude, SpongeBob.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Pearl, can I see to you in the kitchen for a second?

speaker: Pearl
line: Sure, SpongeBob. [they walk to the kitchen]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [thinking] How am I going to break it to her? I've never fired anyone before. I just got to say it. Pearl, you're fired! Okay, here it goes. [SpongeBob opens his mouth to say it, but Pearl is already crying]

speaker: Pearl
line: [crying] Oh, SpongeBob! [SpongeBob lets out a sigh of some relief]

speaker: Pearl
line: I can't take it anymore! Nothing I do is working!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sure it is, Pearl. Look at all the hip, young people eating sa-lads!

speaker: Pearl
line: No, don't you get it! I've been trying to get fired since day one! I was only pretending to like this place to please Daddy. This job is cutting majorly into my social life. Oh SpongeBob, what should I do?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob thinks for a second] I got it! I can pretend to [air quotes] "fire you." I'll take the heat from old man Krabs later.

speaker: Pearl
line: [Pearl grabs SpongeBob in a bone-snapping hug] Gosh, you'd really do that for me? You're a great pal, SpongeBob. How can I ever thank you?!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [muffled] Stop trying to break me in half?

speaker: Pearl
line: [Pearl drops him] Deal. [cut to SpongeBob and Pearl walking up to Mr. Krabs' door, Pearl tries to conceal her laughing] Oh, boy! ,

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Okay, Pearl. We've got to make this convincing. [loud and clear] Pearl I need to have a word with you! [we see Mr. Krabs in his office sobbing]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Oh no, here it goes! I don't know if I can bear to listen.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: It's not that you haven't done a good job around here, it's just that...

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: [Mr. Krabs is pushed against the door] Don't be too hard on her, now. Why does it have to be this way? [he sees himself in the uniform in the mirror] It's for the best.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, we feel it might be in everybody's best interest if...

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: I can't let him do this! [he goes for the door, then sees the vault open. It's empty, and a spider crawls around its web] Get on with it, SpongeBob!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Pearl, you're fired. [Mr. Krabs chokes and falls over]

speaker: Pearl
line: Thanks, SpongeBob. [kisses him. She runs off and jumps into a car with all her friends] Come on gang, the mall awaits! [they drive off. SpongeBob runs into the office]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey, Mr. Krabs, I did it! [he screams when he sees Mr. Krabs' body. He runs over to a bill behind glass, which is for emergency purposes and he breaks the glass. He waves the bill under Krabs' nose]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: [regaining consciousness] Oh Pearly... [sniffs] Is that a 20? [he pockets the bill] Oh SpongeBob, how could I have done such a thing to me own flesh and blood? [cries]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: There, there, Mr. Krabs. Pearl took it just fine, in fact, she seemed sort of happy.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Really?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: She's off to bigger and better things.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: That's me old girl; tough as nails, just like her old man! [laughs] But how am I going to get my money back for all this stuff? [SpongeBob thinks. Cut to his house, where all the stuff is put up in his house. SpongeBob dances in his uniform to the music]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [laughing] Isn't this great, Gary? And it only cost me one year's salary!

speaker: Gary
line: [Gary is covered in stuffed animals and his shell has flowers painted on it] Meow?

speaker: Narrator
line: Welcome to Bikini Bottom, where can be found some of the finest specimens of undersea life. [chuckles] Well, you know. [Patrick is sleeping and the mailfish walks by and puts a box in his open mouth as he is yawning and waking up, he grabs it and quickly opens it, and it turns out to be a shiny, gold trophy]

speaker: Patrick
line: An award? I never got an award before! Eeeee! Look rock, I got an award. [arrow on top of rock breaks] Jellyfish, I got an award. [jellyfish zap him and he jumps up above the surface] Island, I got an awar... [chokes for air and floats back down] I gotta show SpongeBob.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [building a house of cards looking like Gary] Hold still, Gary.

speaker: Gary
line: Meow.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Almost done. [Patrick smashes through the wall and cards fall on the floor. Gary flies away]

speaker: Patrick
line: Hey, SpongeBob, guess what? I got an award.[SpongeBob falls down to the floor]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: That's great, Patrick. What's it for?

speaker: Patrick
line: See for yourself.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [his body is facedown but his face come out and reads the award] "For Outstanding Achievement In Achievement SpongeBob SquarePants?"

speaker: Patrick
line: SpongeBob SquarePants? That's a funny way to spell my name.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick, I think the award is for me. You must've got it by mistake.

speaker: Patrick
line: But, it's shiny. [SpongeBob takes the trophy]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Yeah, but you know what else is shiny?

speaker: Patrick
line: Ice cream!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Exactly!

speaker: Patrick
line: I can find it. Is it in here?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No, don't! That's my... [Patrick opens the door and a bunch of awards pile out of SpongeBob's closet] ...award closet.

speaker: Patrick
line: I want an award. [starts to cry]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob with two 1st place ribbons in his eyes] Aww, Patrick, don't cry.[Patrick starts sobbing loudly going away from the awards]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You'll get an award one day.

speaker: Patrick
line: I'm never gonna get an award because I haven't done anything.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But you're Patrick... [jumps on Patrick and his eyes turn into stars] Star. You can do anything you want.

speaker: Patrick
line: That's easy for you to say. You're SpongeBob.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick, if you wanna win an award, you have to do something.

speaker: Patrick
line: Hmmm...I wanna defeat the giant monkeyman and save the 9th dimension!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Me too! But that sounds a little hard. Why don't we start smaller?

speaker: Patrick
line: I wanna defeat the little monkeyman and save the 8th dimension!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Smaller. [shrinks]

speaker: Patrick
line: Doctor?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Smaller. [shrinks more]

speaker: Patrick
line: Fireman?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [said in the tiny voice] The smallest you can think of. [shrinks even more]

speaker: Patrick
line: A job at the Krusty Krab?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [normal voice] Yeah! [grows to normal size] I do things at work all the time.

speaker: Patrick
line: Then let's go. [Patrick runs off, pulling off SpongeBob's arm]

speaker: Patrick
line: Boy, it sure was nice of Mr. Krabs to give me a job.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: And at 50 dollars an hour, too. When I started working here, I had to pay Mr. Krabs 100 dollars an hour. Hey, Squidward, guess who just got a job?

speaker: Squidward
line: Guess who just quit? [puts his hat on Patrick's head and then leaves]

speaker: Patrick
line: Do I get my award yet?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You have to work for it, remember?

speaker: Patrick
line: Tartar sauce. [SpongeBob flipping patties]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob places the order in the window] Pick up order! [Patrick comes and eats the order]

speaker: Patrick
line: Do I get my award, now?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No, you have to take the tray to the customer.

speaker: Patrick
line: Ok. [tray gets to table but with no food. Patrick burps]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Almost. Try again and this time make sure the food gets to the table. [Patrick arrives with food on tray but then eats it as he sits down]

speaker: Patrick
line: Like that?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Nope.

speaker: Patrick
line: [spits out food at the customer as he talks] Barnacles!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Let's try something different.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: All you have to do is answer the phone.

speaker: Patrick
line: Ai Yai, Captain [phone rings]

speaker: Guy On Phone
line: Is this the Krusty Krab?

speaker: Patrick
line: No, this is Patrick. [hangs up and starts whistling. phone rings again]

speaker: Girl On Phone
line: Is this the Krusty Krab?

speaker: Patrick
line: [annoyed] No! this is Patrick! [hangs up and continues to whistle. phone rings, yet again]

speaker: Another Guy On Phone
line: Is this the Krusty Krab?

speaker: Patrick
line: [infuriated] No! This is Patrick! [puts phone down] I'm not a Krusty Krab.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Uhh, Patrick, that's the name of the restaurant.

speaker: Patrick
line: Huh? Oh, Fishpaste!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: It looks a little dusty around Table 3. How about you sweep it out? [hands Patrick a broom]

speaker: Patrick
line: What's the point? I can't do anything right.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You'll do fine. [Patrick sweeps with the top side of the broom instead of the bottom]

speaker: Nat
line: [approaches Patrick] Hey pal. You just blow in from Stupidtown? [continues drinking]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Keep trying, Patrick.

speaker: Delivery Guy
line: I've got a load of awards for SpongeBob SquarePants. [Patrick becomes furious and sweeps harder]

speaker: Patrick
line: Why can't I do anything right?! [bangs the bottom of the broom on the floor making dust rise all over the Krusty Krab's dining area, which makes the nearby customers start coughing]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [pushing Patrick] Kitchen!

speaker: Patrick
line: [throws the broom to the floor] I'm never going to get an award, now.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Don't give up, Patrick. This time I've got something I know you can do. We're gonna open a jar. [gets a jar and opens the lid] Easy. Now you try. First get a jar. [Patrick gets out a pickle] Patrick, that's a pickle.

speaker: Patrick
line: Yes.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You need a jar. [picks up a spatula] No. [picks up his pants] No. [picks up SpongeBob] No. Try...this! [gives Patrick a jar] Now take the lid off the jar. [puts the lid in his mouth] Just relax. Lift your hand. [Patrick lifts his hand] Great! We're almost there. Now put it on the lid. [puts his hand on counter] No, the lid. [slides his hand to the corner of the counter] [Patrick tries for the lid over and over as SpongeBob keeps telling him "the lid", Patrick pants due to exhaustion. Few seconds later, Patrick is almost there] Freeze!! [hand is on the side of the jar] Almost there. Now head for the lid. [hand goes lower] Cold. [hand goes higher] Warmer. [hand goes higher] Warmer. [hand goes higher] Warmer. You're hot. You're on fire!

speaker: Patrick
line: Ow, it burns!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Ok, ok. Wait, wait. Do exactly as I do. [takes it off again] Exactly as I do. [takes it off again] Exactly. Exactly. Exactly.

speaker: Patrick
line: Exactly as you do. [takes lid off jar, then starts to cry] Oh, no, I broke it!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No, no, Patrick, you did it!

speaker: Patrick
line: I did? [both cheer as Patrick throws the jar into the floor] Touchdown! I'm jarmaster!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: That was great, Patrick! You really got the hang of it.

speaker: Patrick
line: Yeah. Remember when I had my up? And I put it on the lid?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh, yeah.

speaker: Patrick
line: Then I took the lid off and I thought I broke it.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [laughs] Yeah.

speaker: Patrick
line: But I didn't. I opened the jar with my hand. And it was all because you showed me how to do it. I'm never gonna forget this.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick, you do exactly what I do and you'll have an award in no time. [night becomes day in SpongeBob's House then clam crows everyone up] I'm ready. I'm ready. I'm ready. I'm ready. [notices Patrick dressed up like him]

speaker: Patrick
line: Good morning, SpongeBob.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Wow. It's amazing how a simple change of clothes can make a guy look...just...like...me.

speaker: Patrick
line: Yup. If I'm gonna be an award winner, I've gotta dress like one.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: That's creepy...but flattering! I'm ready, I'm ready, I'm ready... [Patrick copies SpongeBob then SpongeBob stops] Huh?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, back to the ol' grind.

speaker: Patrick
line: Well, back to the ol' grind.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Forget my hat.

speaker: Patrick
line: Uhh, me, too.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob mops the floor then puts the mop up. Patrick mops the floor but he makes the floor wet. SpongeBob comes out with a handful of plates and slips and breaks them all. Patrick follows in SpongeBob's footsteps. SpongeBob glares at him]

speaker: SpongeBob and Patrick
line: [at the grill, frying patties, both whistle a tune, then stop, they both wipe their foreheads] Whew! [SpongeBob drops his spatula]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [laughs] Dropped my spatula. [bends down to pick it up]

speaker: Patrick
line: Uhh, me, too. [drops spatula and bends down to pick it up. SpongeBob takes off his hat, then Patrick takes off his, they both put their hats back on. Then they both put their hands on the grill. Patrick's hand burns after a few seconds] Ow!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Aha! [shows the fake hand] You're copying me!

speaker: Patrick
line: Yes.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Why are you doing that?

speaker: Patrick
line: So I can win an award like you.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, it's annoying, so stop it!

speaker: Patrick
line: Stop it. [both imitate the others facial expressions]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Say, you're good.

speaker: Patrick
line: Thanks.

speaker: SpongeBob and Patrick
line: Ha! Darn. [both look at each other with suspicion, while rubbing their chin] Mary had a little lamb whose fleece was white as...pickled fish lips!! [both cover their mouth] Sea weavle. Gorgy smorgy.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [in his mind] At least I'm safe inside my mind.

speaker: Patrick
line: [in his mind] At least I'm safe inside my mind.

speaker: SpongeBob and Patrick
line: [screaming]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [he and Patrick run out of the Krusty Krab] Stop copying me!

speaker: Patrick
line: There's no award for that.

speaker: Squidward
line: [leaning against the Krusty Krab sign pole, reading a newspaper, a Krusty Krab hat falls near him] Well, I guess it's safe to go in, now. [puts hat back on and walks back in]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [he and Patrick are still running] Patrick, how long are you going to keep this up?

speaker: Patrick
line: Until I have as many awards as you.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: We'll see about that!

speaker: Patrick
line: No, we won't.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [takes out a jump-rope] I'm the jump-rope champion of Bikini Bottom.

speaker: Patrick
line: Me, too. [takes out a jump-rope]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh, yeah? I call this one The Slice N' Dice. [crosses arms and jump-ropes while Patrick tries to imitate but ties himself up with his rope] Ha! Not a scratch on me. [body breaks down into pieces]

speaker: Patrick
line: Oh, no, you don't! [squeezes the rope on himself breaking his body down into smaller pieces. Then both hit a hammer on their heads]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Not much fun being me, now, huh Patrick?

speaker: Patrick
line: Are you kidding? I used to do this way before I started copying you. [SpongeBob stops hammering his head but Patrick does not notice. Patrick hits himself faster and too hard, he stops and gets dizzy, trophies appear and spin around his head, and falls on the ground. SpongeBob runs into Patrick's rock painted as SpongeBob's house, SpongeBob gets mad and steam comes out of his head]

speaker: Patrick
line: My turn! [runs into the pineapple rock]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [runs into his house] I wish I had the old Patrick back, but he just wants to be like me. [pushes his nose into his face and comes out of his house dressed in Patrick's normal outfit] Hi, I'm Patrick Star. I'm the laziest, pinkest starfish in Bikini Bottom and I wish I were me and not SpongeBob.

speaker: Patrick
line: What's so great about being a Big Pink Loser? [SpongeBob's nose pops back out] Exactly. I was never closer to an award then the minute I started copying you.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But, Patrick...

speaker: Patrick
line: Patrick's not here!

speaker: Delivery Guy
line: [stops in front of SpongeBob and Patrick in truck] Trophy delivery! [he drives off and Spongebob has a package in his mouth]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Another trophy?

speaker: Patrick
line: Oh, great! [SpongeBob opens the package] What's it for this time?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: 'For Doing Absolutely Nothing Longer Than Anyone Else'.

speaker: Patrick
line: Yay! [puts trophy on head like a hat] Eee! [both rip off their present outfit to reveal their own normal outfits.]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: So, what are you going to do, now?

speaker: Patrick
line: I'm gonna go protect my title. [jumps on his rock and falls asleep, the rock closes]

speaker: Narrator
line: So you thought I was kidding, huh? No, in Bikini Bottom, excellence can be found, even under a rock.

speaker: Narrator
line: Every day is a holiday for SpongeBob, even if he has to make one up.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [jumps out of bed] Hey everybody! It's Leif Ericcson Day! Hinga-dinga-durgin! Ahoy, Patrick! It's Leif Ericcson Day! There's a note.

speaker: Patrick
line: [as note] SpongeBob, went to get more giant paper. Uhhhh...Patrick. P.S. Happy Leif Ericcson Day! Yingin-hinga- dinga!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Aww... so much for that. Maybe Sandy will play with me. [throws his costume away] Another note.

speaker: Sandy
line: [as note] SpongeBob, went south for the winter. Love, Sandy.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I don't get it. The water's fine. [scene shows the treedome snowing inside] Hey Squidward! Want to play?

speaker: Squidward
line: [as note] No.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Are you sure?

speaker: Squidward
line: [as note] Yes.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Darn. I wish I had a buddy to play with. I know! I'll make one! Stick Buddy! [lets go of the stick which falls to the ground] Nah... [scene cuts to SpongeBob standing next to a pile of rocks] Rock Buddy! Nope... [scene cuts to SpongeBob standing next to a sink] Sink Buddy! "[Sink Buddy drips a little water]" Almost... [scene cuts to SpongeBob again] I've got it! [dips his bubble wand into bubble soap and blows a human shape-like bubble] Bubble Buddy! [scene cuts to SpongeBob and his bubble pal on the seesaw] This...is...great! [scene cuts to SpongeBob going up to the Krusty Krab with his bubble] I can't wait for you to meet Squidward and Mr. Krabs. [SpongeBob walks in the Krusty Krab but his bubble just floats at the door] Don't be shy, come on! [SpongeBob squeezes the bubble through the doors]

speaker: Squidward
line: Please come again. When I'm not working. Next.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hi Squidward!

speaker: Squidward
line: How am I supposed to enjoy your day off if you come to work anyway?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I want you to meet my new friend, Bubble Buddy!

speaker: Squidward
line: This bubble is your friend? [sees his reflection in Bubble Buddy's face; giggles] Well, he's handsome, I'll give him that. What'll it be?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh, I'm not hungry.

speaker: Squidward
line: Well, thanks for stopping by.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Wait! You haven't taken Bubble Buddy's order yet!

speaker: Squidward
line: Why would I do that?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: He's hungry.

speaker: Squidward
line: He's an inanimate object, his money's no good here!

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: [comes out of the register] What are you saying, Mr. Squidward? Everyone's money is good here. [a criminal is eating a Krabby Patty] At the Krusty Krab, we serves all kinds.

speaker: Squidward
line: I'm not taking an order for a bubble.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Sure you are! Or I'll fill your life with misery and woe. [goes back to the cash register, then he peeks at Squidward] Even if you quit. [goes back into the cash register again]

speaker: Squidward
line: May I take your order?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Wait, Bubble Buddy. Let me decide for you. [reads the menu] Hmmm. Krabby Patty, Double Patty Patty, Krabby Junior Junior, Jumbo Small Patty, Junior Senior Sophomore Patty, Quarter Ouncer Double Pounder...ohh, it's all so good! He'll just take one of everything. [Mr. Krabs explodes through the cash register]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: One of everything?! Whoopee! [rips off his shirt and applies a tattoo on himself that has a heart and the words "Bubble Buddy" through it] I love Bubble Buddy! Squidward, show our best customer to his table. [points his eyes to a table in the opposite direction]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Bubble Buddy's thirsty.

speaker: Squidward
line: How about a glass of our finest shampoo? [laughs]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sounds great! [Squidward walks off and returns with a shampoo bottle with a straw in it]

speaker: Squidward
line: Here's your hair care product, sir.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Uhh, Bubble Buddy likes bendy straws. [Squidward bends the straw] Huh, what's that? Bubble Buddy says it tastes funny. What do you think?

speaker: Squidward
line: Mr. Krabs!

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: [chews and spits a Krabby Patty for an old lady to eat] Think of the customer.

speaker: Squidward
line: [drinks shampoo] Oh, silly me. I got the diet shampoo. Here we go, one of everything for Bubble Buddy.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh no, Squidward, wait! There's cheese on these patties!

speaker: Squidward
line: And?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Bubble Buddy's lactose-intolerant, he can't eat cheese! What should we do?

speaker: Squidward
line: We? How about you take these patties and sho...

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Mr. Squidward! [walks off with the cart]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Don't worry, Bubble Buddy. Squidward will make a fresh batch.

speaker: Squidward
line: What, is he allergic to bread, too?

speaker: SpongeBob
