line: Four-way intersection, and skip rope with it, than continue living where you do now? Then move to- [the screen goes to static, as Patrick has changed the channel with a remote]

speaker: Patrick
line: I hate this channel.

speaker: Squidward
line: No! No! [he grabs the remote and changes it back]

speaker: TV Octopus
line: -Tentacle Acres! Where happiness is just a suction cup away! [he puts his tentacles together and pops them. The pop echoes. Cut to a large complex, fenced off. There is a golden door, and above it is the sign "Tentacle Acres." Squidward walks to the door, with his clarinet and a few other things. He talks into the intercom on the door]

speaker: Squidward
line: Hello?

speaker: Guard
line: Yes, can I help you?

speaker: Squidward
line: I'm here about the happiness. I'll be moving in now.

speaker: Guard
line: Are you alone?

speaker: Squidward
line: No. I mean, yes. There's nobody with me. Yes, peace and quiet.

speaker: Guard
line: Are you now, or have you ever been, a sponge?

speaker: Squidward
line: No.

speaker: Guard
line: What about a-

speaker: Squidward
line: [cuts him off] No, no starfish. Just a regular, normal, peace-loving- [the door begins to rumble and the gates open, revealing an entire town of houses just like Squidward's old one. A rainbow is formed. Squidward is overjoyed and walks in. He sees octopus kids at an ice cream truck] Heaven at last. [he runs into another octopus walking by]

speaker: Other Octopus
line: I've seen more alert people in a retirement home.

speaker: Squidward
line: Oh, which way to the Living-without-a-brain seminar? Don't be late.

speaker: Other Octopus
line: I've heard better comebacks from a turkey sandwich, get a life! [Squidward squints angrily at him, then becomes happy]

speaker: Squidward
line: This place is even better than I expected! [walks down the road, reading off the house numbers] 302, 303, and 304. Beautiful. [he walks in to house 304] And not a pineapple in sight. [he shuts the door]

speaker: [Cut to night, where Squidward is in cap, nightshirt, and slipper, going to bed. His clarinet, as always, is next to him]
Squidward
line: Good night, Clary. Tomorrow, we begin life anew.

speaker: [the phone rings, startling Squidward. Squidward answers it]
Squidward
line: 304 New Life street, Squidward speaking. [he hears SpongeBob on the other end speaking gibberish] There is no way I am moving back there, SpongeBob. I am finally among my own kind. [he hears more garbling] Now goodbye!

speaker: [He hangs up. Back at SpongeBob's place, he and Patrick are crushed and exchange gibberish]
[The next day, Squidward walks out of his house and breathes in the fresh air]
Squidette
line: Would you pipe down over there, iron lung? [the two start laughing, their foreheads fluctuating up and down as they do. Squidward sucks up the croquet balls and the man's croquet hammer which he was leaning on. He falls to the ground. Squidward laughs]

speaker: Squidward
line: Looks like when it comes to having fun, you don't have a "leg" to stand on! [he continues laughing. The woman helps the octopus up]

speaker: Squidette
line: Hey! That's not funny!

speaker: Octopus #1
line: Yeah! [another man walks by, clarinet in hand]

speaker: Octopus #2
line: What's going on over here? [the croquet woman points at Squidward]

speaker: Squidette
line: [Points at Squidward] It's that guy! He's playing with a reef blower!

speaker: Octopus #2
line: Playing? With a reef blower? That's the most childish thing I've ever heard of!

speaker: Squidward
line: But it's fun!

speaker: Octopus #2
line: [Octopus #2 laughs] How could you possibly have fun with one of those oversized hair dryers?

speaker: Squidward
line: Like this! [Squidward sucks up the man's clarinet, and it gets stuck in the nozzle, playing sour notes. The octopus screams]

speaker: Octopus #2
line: Give it back! Please! [Squidward blows it back at him, lodging it in the middle of his face like a crease. Squidward laughs maniacally and runs off. He approaches an octopus on a bike and sticks the nozzle to the "wheel"]

speaker: Squidward
line: Tag! You're it! [he blows on it, inflating the octopus's head.]

speaker: Squidette
line: What can I get you boys? [Squidward opens a door on the stand and sucks up the two guys' eyes and noses and blows them back out, but puts two noses on one guy and four eyes on the other guy. He runs off laughing]

speaker: Octopus
line: What are you looking at?

speaker: Octopus #2
line: Those. [meanwhile, SpongeBob and Patrick approach the complex]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Here it is, Patrick. Now we've just got to convince Squidward to come back home. You got the apology cake? [Patrick picks up a cake that reads, 'Sorry.' He puts it back in his pants, revealing a giant cake-shaped bulge in them] We're ready!

speaker: Patrick
line: Ying! [SpongeBob pushes the button on the intercom]

speaker: Guard
line: Hello, can I help you?

speaker: Patrick
line: Can I get a large #1, extra size?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But you just ate three orders of fried oyster skins. [Patrick opens his mouth, the fumes emerging from it. A foghorn sounds]

speaker: Patrick
line: I love... fried oyster skins. [cut to inside the control room, where the guard sees SpongeBob and Patrick on one of his monitors]

speaker: Guard
line: We're sorry, but your kind isn't allowed here. [a security guard walks up next to him] He's not leaving, Orville. [the fumes enter the room] You got your night stick ready? [the two smell] Fried oyster skins?! [the two collapse, the guard falling on a button opening the gate]

speaker: Patrick
line: I guess we've got to order inside. [meanwhile, a group of octopi are angrily chasing after a happy-go-lucky Squidward. He sucks the noses off of three houses whilst running by. SpongeBob and Patrick are walking by when they see Squidward run past them]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey! That looked like Squidward! [the mob runs past them] That looked like Squidward also, in angry mob form! [Squidward has approached a dead end]

speaker: Policeman
line: Hold it right there, Mr. Tentacles!

speaker: Squidward
line: Stand back! I've got gardening tools! [the policeman hands him an envelope]

speaker: Policeman
line: Here! Just read this! [Squidward looks at it]

speaker: Squidward
line: What is it?

speaker: Policeman
line: A well thought out and organized list of complaints! [the mob shouts out in agreement. SpongeBob and Patrick walk by]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick, look! It's Squidward! [he runs up to the guy and hugs him, but he's a different octopus with eyebrows and mustache, and a shirt like Squidward's] Squidward! We finally found you! [the octopus pushes SpongeBob off him]

speaker: Octopus
line: Get off me! I'm not Squidward! [pause]

speaker: Patrick
line: Are you Squidward now?

speaker: Policeman
line: FYI, you don't have to live here, you know! [Squidward, and the crowd, smile]

speaker: Squidward
line: Hey, you're right! [the crowd members' smiles fade] And I'm leaving ASAP! [meanwhile, SpongeBob and Patrick are trying to find Squidward]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Are you Squidward?

speaker: Male Octopus
line: No. [he walks up to the croquet woman]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Are you Squidward?

speaker: Squidette
line: No. [Patrick talks to a fire hydrant]

speaker: Patrick
line: Are you Squidward? [pause] That's OK, take your time. [SpongeBob walks up to him]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Any one of these Squidward's can be the real Squidward, Patrick! [the town rumbles as Squidward rockets the leaf blower out of Tentacle Acres and laughs maniacally]

speaker: Squidward
line: Freedom! Woo-hoo! [SpongeBob and Patrick watch him fly over the horizon]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, we know one thing it sure isn't that guy!

speaker: Sandy
line: There we go! [Sandy rakes a pile of leaves in the shape of Texas] SpongeBob, I got all the leaves ra... [steps on piles of leaves still on the ground] SpongeBob, what are all these leaves doing here? You said you were going to rake them!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [peeks his head out of a pile of leaves he is in] I am raking the leaves.

speaker: Sandy
line: But they're still all over the ground!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sandy, I can't rake any faster. [picks up a leaf and starts scraping it with a tiny rake] These are big leaves. [leaf breaks into more pieces] And they keep breaking into more leaves. [Sandy pushes him away and rakes them herself] Then go scrape the salt lick or somethin'! We got to get this stuff done before it's too late! What's the big rush anyway, Sandy?

speaker: Sandy
line: [hanging laundry] I told ya, SpongeBob... [scrubs the birdbath with a toothbrush] I'm hibernating next week.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hibernating? What's that?

speaker: Sandy
line: [painting the fence] It's when I go to sleep for the whole winter.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Can I do that?

speaker: Sandy
line: [chuckles] No, silly. It's a mammalian thing. [paints over SpongeBob's helmet]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sandy, you may not have noticed, but I is 100% ma-male.

speaker: Sandy
line: [cleaning her exercise wheel] Enough chitter-chatter, SpongeBob. We don't have much time left!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Why, Sandy? When does your... "carburation" begin? [Sandy jumps down, pulling down a giant calendar with a giant x on the 8th]

speaker: Sandy
line: In one week!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But Sandy, that only gives us 1, 2, 3... [gasps] 168 more hours of playtime!

speaker: Sandy
line: You're telling me. And there's still so much stuff to do! We gotta climb some things!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Climb!

speaker: Sandy
line: We gotta jump off of stuff!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Jump!

speaker: Sandy
line: We gotta ride!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Ride!

speaker: Sandy
line: I don't wanna go to sleep yet!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Wait Sandy! [Sandy starts to cry]

speaker: Sandy
line: I can't burn carbs in my sleep!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sandy?

speaker: Sandy
line: What?!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sandy, I'm willing to sacrifice any of my time that I haven't already sold to Mr. Krabs to you. [Pantera playing]

speaker: Sandy
line: Well I'm glad, SpongeBob, 'cause for the next seven days, it's gonna be you, me, and these sweatbands! [holds them up. Cut to the giant sand mountains area. Sandy is riding a giant clam shell smashing through a sign] Yee-ha! [sliding down the mountain so fast she is now on fire. She rides past a fish with a backpack on his back. When she goes past him, he drops to the ground and rolls around cause he is on fire. She then rides past a man and a woman. The woman now wears a jogging outfit and the man is now riding a tricycle and holding a lollipop and paddleball. The woman looks at him]

speaker: Fish #1
line: Uh... I can explain. [Sandy flips in mid-air, still on fire]

speaker: Sandy
line: I'm hotter than a hickory-smoked sausage! Woo-hoo! [SpongeBob is wearing his green karate head gear and riding down the mountain on his tongue. Cut to two kids, building a sandman]

speaker: Girl
line: Maybe, if we sing that song, he'll come to life.

speaker: Billy
line: Ready?

speaker: Both
line: [singing] Oh, there once was a sandman... [SpongeBob rides into the sandman. a musical note pops up]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Life's as extreme as you want to make it! [jumps off the mountain] Whoo!

speaker: Girl
line: Maybe we didn't sing it right. [SpongeBob flying toward the ground. When he hits it, two bones are sticking out]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Yeah. [cut to Sandy and SpongeBob standing outside Sandy's treedome] Whew, what a workout. [pulls out his right arm and shows its damages] I'm going to be feeling this tomorrow. [his arm falls to the ground] Ow.

speaker: Sandy
line: I got to say, I'm impressed with you, SpongeBob. You're making this the best pre-hibernation week ever.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, I'd better get home before Gary chews up the sofa again. [sighs as he lifts up his left leg and moves it alternately with the other over to his house. Later, it's nighttime and he is finally crawling into bed] Good night Gary. [falls asleep. Then Sandy pushes a button which launches SpongeBob out of his bed and into a lake. SpongeBob is now a block of ice. Sandy jumps in and becomes a block of ice]

speaker: Sandy
line: Nothing like a refreshing morning dip, huh, SpongeBob?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [shivering] W-what h-happened to s-sleeping? [Sandy pulls down a calendar]

speaker: Sandy
line: I'll be asleep all winter! We only got three days for fun. [swims away] Well hurry now! The giant clams like to feed at this hour! [cut to SpongeBob lifting a bowling ball into a tube. Sandy blows her whistle giving the signal and SpongeBob runs to the end and picks up a few jacks before the bowling ball hits him on his head. Sandy does the same thing but the bowling ball cracks her helmet] Isn't this great?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Yeah! I've never played extreme jacks before! [cut to Sandy and SpongeBob with giant q-tips]

speaker: Sandy
line: Ok SpongeBob, this one's going to be fun. We just whack each other with these giant ear cleaners 'til one of us falls off. [lifts hers up] On your mark... get set...

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sandy, are you sure we're supposed to be standing up here?

speaker: Sandy
line: Go! [hits SpongeBob off a building. SpongeBob lands on a fire hydrant. Sandy rides up on a two-seated bike] Come on, SpongeBob. We're goin' for a tandem ride through the park!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Gee, that sounds safe! I mean, fun. [gets up but leaves a piece of himself on the fire hydrant. He jumps on the bike] Ok, I'm ready! I thought you said we were riding through the park, Sandy!

speaker: Sandy
line: I did, SpongeBob, the industrial park! [they ride into a giant factory] This is where the real action is! [Sandy pedals on barbed wire] This part gets pretty technical! Yee-haw! Now for the speed course. Hold on! [they ride through a conveyor belt with a giant crunching mouth at the end] I hope we make it! [bike begins to fall to the ground fast. SpongeBob screams] I'm havin' fun, too! [as they hit the ground, SpongeBob melts into a puddle. Sandy tosses a fishing rod on him] Wake up, slowpoke. [scene scrolls over to show a plane] We're going fly-fishing. [rimshot]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [thinking] This squirrel's trying to kill me! Any more of these stunts and I'll be reduced to a puddle! [sees his shoe floating] Wait a minute, I've got to talk my way out of this! Sandy, I think I need to tell you something.

speaker: Sandy
line: What is it?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, it's just that I'm feeling sort of... [his mouth melts away from his eyes. He pulls it back up] I just feel like maybe I need to... [his mouth melts away again. Sandy puts her hand over his mouth]

speaker: Sandy
line: Hold that thought, SpongeBob! 'Cause it's time for a down-home favorite! [holds up a piece of hay. Pantera plays again] Find the hay in the needle stack! [throws it in a giant pile of needles. Cut to inside the needle pile where SpongeBob is covered in needles and still getting poked with them] Did you find it?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Not yet.

speaker: Sandy
line: Well I'm going to look over here.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You do that. [SpongeBob digs a hole underground then emerges]

speaker: Sandy
line: Found it, SpongeBob! [SpongeBob runs away] Come on. Best two out of three.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Gotta hide! Gotta hide! Home? No. Gary can't keep a secret. [looks at Patrick's rock] Under a rock? It's so original! [as he jumps for the rock, his pants get stuck on a small coral bush]

speaker: Sandy
line: SpongeBob?! [SpongeBob struggles to get free and eventually does but leaves his pants stuck on the plant] SpongeBob? [Sandy walks up to SpongeBob's pants] Where are you, little square dude? [gasps] SpongeBob's tie! And all his other little dressins! But... but... he always folds his clothes before running around in the nude! Something terrible must have happened to him! [crunching and munching] Alright, listen up, y'all! I'm rounding up a search party! SpongeBob's gone missing! [Squidward smiles at Mr. Krabs]

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Man the lifeboats!

speaker: Sandy
line: Alpha Team, you search uptown. Gold Team searches downtown. Any questions?

speaker: Frank
line: Gold Team rules!

speaker: Sandy
line: Now get movin'! [crowd yelling][Fred put a Lost poster with a picture of SpongeBob] SpongeBob? [Cuts to Sandy and the search party] Someone look up there. [Sandy pops out of a sewer] Put your doors, and friends into it! [cut to searching in the sulfur fields] Come on! He could be anywhere in these sulfur fields! [Clay looks in a spout]

speaker: Sandy
line: Check in this here moist cave! [Old Man Jenkins, Nathaniel and Scooter walk in shouting for SpongeBob then run out, realizing the cave is actually a three-eyed sea elephant]

speaker: Sandy
line: Status report!

speaker: Small Fish
line: [covered in Poison Sea Urchins] He's not at the Poison Sea Urchin cove.

speaker: Sandy
line: Well, look again!

speaker: Vera
line: [covered in leeches] He's not at the leech farm.

speaker: Sandy
line: Well, look again!

speaker: Squidward
line: He's not in my thoughts.

speaker: Sandy
line: Well, think again! [cut to Sandy talking into a megaphone] Attention Bikini Bottom, the time has come to double, no, triple our efforts!

speaker: Squidward
line: How about a break?! We've been at it for days!

speaker: Debbie
line: Think about the children!

speaker: Sandy
line: That's a good idea! Use the children to crawl into small places you couldn't normally reach.

speaker: Frank
line: [whispering to Sadie] This is a load of barnacles.

speaker: Sandy
line: I heard that!! No one's going anywhere until we find SpongeBob!

speaker: Frank
line: Uh... uh, wait! [picks up Francis] Uh, here he is!

speaker: Sandy
line: That ain't SpongeBob! SpongeBob is square!

speaker: Francis
line: [in a poor imitation of SpongeBob] I'm ready! I'm ready!

speaker: Sandy
line: No you ain't! [Clay holds up a box of Kelp-O]

speaker: Clay
line: I found SquareBob!

speaker: Sandy
line: That's just a cereal box. Besides, he's yellow.

speaker: Charlie
line: [holds up a banana] Uh... here he is! Hey, can I go home now?

speaker: Tina
line: [points up] Oh, look! He's up in the sky! [Sandy looks up]

speaker: Sandy
line: He's not...huh? [everyone is gone] They must have gone to search some more. [Sandy continues searching for SpongeBob] SpongeBob, where are you?! [lifts up a house] You under there? [lifts up another house] Nope. [lifts up another house where the fish from before is at]

speaker: Fish #1
line: Uhh, I can explain.

speaker: Fish #9
line: That squirrel's gone crazy!

speaker: Woman
line: But she'll never look under a rock.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [laughs] You said it! Sandy'll never find us! [Everyone glares at SpongeBob and throws him out] Hey wait, you don't understand!

speaker: Squidward
line: [pops out from under the rock] Oh look, it is I, SpongeBob, out here in the open. [Sandy turns around]

speaker: Sandy
line: SpongeBob?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [loud bang] C'mon, let me back in! You don't understand! [Sandy hugs SpongeBob]

speaker: Sandy
line: Oh, SpongeBob, I was so worried! I thought something terrible happened! [grabs his arm] Come on. There's just enough time to go atom smashing. [Sandy runs but SpongeBob is not moving]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sandy, wait!

speaker: Sandy
line: There's no time to wait! Hibernation! [pulls on SpongeBob's arm]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sandy, you've got to make time! This is important! [Sandy lets go of SpongeBob's arm] I...am a man! [holds up a razor] OK, Sandy, I...I...I...I...I can't play with you anymore! I just can't take the games! They're tearing me apart! [rips off his nose and throws it on the ground then holds onto Sandy's legs crying] There, I said it! Now just promise we can still be friends. Please, Sandy? This isn't easy, I...

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sandy? [chuckles a little] I never thought I'd say it, but thank Neptune for hibernation! [laughs and falls asleep]

speaker: Patrick
line: [returning home with groceries and an ice cream] Who are you people?!

speaker: [A shot of the exterior of the Krusty Krab is shown.]
TV Announcer
line: And now, back to Crustacean Crime Theater.

speaker: [The scene changes to show a black and white TV. On it, there is a sleeping crab. Another crab comes in and evilly laughs. He grabs the crab's shell and the sleeping crab wakes up. The crab, possibly the Sneaky Hermit runs away with the shell, laughing evilly.]
Shellnapping Victim
line: Stop! Thief!

speaker: Cop #1
line: Which way did he go?

speaker: Shellnapping Victim
line: [pointing to the direction the thief ran] He went that way!

speaker: Cop #2
line: Let's get em, boys!

speaker: [four police officers run after the Sneaky Hermit, off-screen. They run back into frame with the Sneaky Hermit tied up. The scene then shows a shot of the Sneaky Hermit wearing.]
Thief
line: [As bars come down and the scene pans out to show the TV inside of the Krusty Krab, at a table.] Curses! Foiled again!

speaker: [The scene shows Mr. Krabs at a table watching a small TV. Patrick and SpongeBob are behind him.]
Mr. Krabs
line: What a no-good eel-in-a-kelp that guy was! [Stands on barrel.] There ain't nothing worse than a thief! [shot changes to a medium close up of Mr. Krabs] Thieves need to be locked up forever! They should all be strung up by their gills and forced to breathe air!

speaker: [The shot returns to the wide shot of Mr. Krabs, SpongeBob, and Patrick.]
SpongeBob
line: But, Mr. Krabs, [shot changes to a medium close up of SpongeBob] what about all the stuff you stole?

speaker: [shot changes to a medium close up of Mr. Krabs]
Mr. Krabs
line: What do you mean?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [The scene returns to the points to the wide shot of Mr. Krabs, SpongeBob, and Patrick. SpongeBob points to the barrel Mr. Krabs is standing on.] Like that barrel. [The scene then shows a close up of the barrel.] It says, "Property of Salty Sea Farms".

speaker: [The scene zooms out a little and Mr. Krabs jumps off the barrel.]
Mr. Krabs
line: Oh, that's where I rent me pickles from.

speaker: [The scene shows a Two-Shot of SpongeBob and Patrick.]
SpongeBob
line: Are you renting the barrel, too?

speaker: [The scene shows a medium close-up of Mr. Krabs.]
Mr. Krabs
line: Well, no.

speaker: [The scene returns to the Two-Shot of SpongeBob and Patrick.]
SpongeBob
line: Then you bought it?

speaker: [The scene returns to medium close-up of Mr. Krabs.]
Mr. Krabs
line: No.

speaker: [The scene returns to the Two-Shot of SpongeBob and Patrick.]
SpongeBob
line: Then, isn't that stealing?

speaker: [The scene returns to the medium close-up of Mr. Krabs.]
Mr. Krabs
line: Well, I, uh...

speaker: [The scene shows a medium shot of Patrick.]
Patrick
line: [While holding up a towel.] What about this towel from the Sizzling Spring Sauna?

speaker: [The scene returns to the medium close-up of Mr. Krabs.]
Mr. Krabs
line: Um... Well..

speaker: [The scene shows a medium shot of SpongeBob.]
SpongeBob
line: [While waving a phone back and forth] And this Bikini Bell phone?

speaker: [The scene returns to the medium close-up of Mr. Krabs.]
Mr. Krabs
line: Well, uh, it's

speaker: [The scene returns to the medium shot of Patrick, who is holding Sandy's hedge clippers.]
Patrick
line: [While holding up hedge clippers] And Sandy's hedge clippers?

speaker: [The scene returns to the medium close-up of Mr. Krabs. He is now starting to sweat]

line: And now, direct from Encino, America's favorite pirate and president of the SpongeBob SquarePants fan club, Patchy the Pirate. [The exterior of Patchy's house is shown. The name "Patchy" appears. Inside, Patchy is wrapping presents]

line: [to the tune of "Jingle Bells"] Yo ho ho, yo ho ho, yo ho ho ho ho ho. [he notices he's on air] Oh! Hi. [he waves] I'm Patchy the Pirate, president of the SpongeBob SquarePants fan club! line: [the cookies are shaped like SpongeBob and Patrick] This here cookie dough is for the children, not for pesky parrots. [Cut to Hans reaching over and ringing a bell. Patchy looks out the window] What's that? Three bells! Well, we all know what three bells means!

line: [squawk] Here you go! [Patchy tugs at it]
