line: [as voiceover] Name and address withheld! [Patchy tears the envelope open, pieces of it flying all over the place. He pulls up his eye patch and replaces it with a pair of reading glasses with one eye covered up]

speaker: Patchy
line: And he writes, "Dear SpongeBob, I am ten years old, and I was wondering if you like Christmas as much as I do. Sincerely yours..."

speaker: Fish Head
line: [as voiceover] Name and address withheld! [Patchy gets up and takes off his glasses. Now his eye patch is back on]

speaker: Patchy
line: A very good question. But you know they didn't always celebrate Christmas in Bikini Bottom.

speaker: Potty
line: [squawk] They didn't?

speaker: Patchy
line: No sir, my fine feathered little neck pain. [He pulls down Potty's strings. Potty, as well as its puppeteer, falls to the ground. Patchy hangs a homemade Sponge ornament on a Xmas tree. Zoom out, showing the entire X-mas tree, which is decorated with many similar Sponge, as well as ornaments featuring Pat and Squid, and a few gift boxes] There was a time when no one had even heard of Christmas in Bikini Bottom. [he snaps his fingers] Hey! Who wants to hear the story of SpongeBob's very first Christmas? [Cut to Potty, who looks very drowsy and with bloodshot eyes. Patchy turns around] Potty?! [he sees an empty bowl of cookie dough, accompanied by a foghorn noise] You ate all me cookie dough! [we see Potty is now incredibly fat. The whole lower half of his body, along with their strings, falls off, leaving only his head]

speaker: Potty
line: Squ-ouch! [Patchy shrugs]

speaker: Patchy
line: Oh well! On with the show!

speaker: [We see Sponge waiting on a hill near Sandy's treedome]
SpongeBob
line: [laughs] Today, I'm gonna sneak up and get that Sandy with a super sneaky karate move. [practices karate]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What diabolical act is she committing now? [Sandy plugs in Christmas lights] Fire! Don't worry, Sandy, I'm coming! Stand back, Sandy, fire! [instead of throwing water on tree, throws it on Sandy] Huh? So I guess there's no fire?

speaker: Sandy
line: What in the name of the Alamo is wrong with you, SpongeBob? Ain't you never seen a Christmas tree before?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Christmas who?

speaker: Sandy
line: What?! Y'all never heard of Christmas?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Is she a friend from Texas?

speaker: Sandy
line: [laughs] No. I can't believe you haven't heard of... [makes an adorable face] ...Christmas.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Tell me more about this... [imitates Sandy] ..."Christmas".

speaker: Patchy
line: And so, Sandy wove the magical tale of gumdrops and pennywhistles. She told of toy-making elves and flying reindeer. But best of all, she told of the one they call, Santa Claus.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: And everyone pretends to like the fruitcake.

speaker: Squidward
line: Yawn.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But the best part is you can write a letter to this guy, Santa Claus, and tell him what you want, and when he comes he brings it to you.

speaker: Patrick
line: Just like a genie. (laughs)

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: I dunno about you, lubbers, but any fella who's giving away free stuff, is a friend o' mine.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: That's the spirit, Mr. Krabs. [grabs a piece of paper] Here you go! You can get started on your letter.

speaker: Squidward
line: I can't believe anybody would celebrate a holiday where a jolly prowler breaks into your house and leaves gifts.

speaker: Patrick
line: Like a genie. (Laughs)

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Pipe down, Squidward. I'm trying to concentrate. This thing is as good as a blank check direct from the First National Bank of Santa Claus.

speaker: Squidward
line: Oh, brother.

speaker: Patrick
line: Yeah.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Okay, who's next?

speaker: Patrick
line: Ooh, ooh, me, me!

speaker: Squidward
line: Ooh.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Here you go, Patrick.

speaker: Patrick
line: There's no words on this paper.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Not yet.

speaker: Patrick
line: Yippee! A writing stick.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: C'mon, Squidward. Write a letter.

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob, grow up will ya? No one's going to give me a gift just because I write them a stupid letter. [Patrick's letter tears in half]

speaker: Patrick
line: SpongeBob, I ripped my paper. Could I have another one?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sure, buddy. Here you go. Okie dokie, Squid... [Patrick rips his again] ...ward.

speaker: Patrick
line: Uhh, SpongeBob... [hands him another piece] Thanks. [sits down and starts writing with the paper on top of the pencil] Dear Sant... [paper rips] D'oh! Not again.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Here, Patrick, watch me. Dear Santa, what do I want for Christmas, you may ask? All I want is for you to visit gentle folk here in Bikini Bottom. That is my wish. [puts the letter in a bottle] Patrick, I designed this mechanism specifically to shoot bottles to the surface. The hopes of everyone rests on the success of its maiden voyage. Fire in the hole!

speaker: Patrick
line: Santa! Haha. Where's Santa?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Santa doesn't come till Christmas Eve.

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: Okay boy, my demands, uhh, I mean, my letter, is ready to go.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Great, Mr. Krabs. What did you wish for?

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: A pony.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Really?

speaker: Mr. Krabs
line: With saddle bags full of money! [shoots a bottle up to the surface]

speaker: Patrick
line: Here you go, SpongeBob.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What did you wish for, Patrick?

speaker: Patrick
line: Another piece of paper. [bottle shoots up to the surface]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: And what did you wish for, little girl?

speaker: Susie
line: Front teeth.

speaker: Cowboy
line: I could use a new hat.

speaker: Jennifer-Millie
line: I need a new hairstyle.

speaker: Lonnie
line: How about a glass of water for my teeth.

speaker: [lots of bottles get shot up to the surface]
Squidward
line: Excuse me, coming through, out of the way.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Great, Squidward, you finished. What's your wish?

speaker: Squidward
line: My wish is that the people of Bikini Bottom will stop paying any attention to the inane dribble that is constantly streaming out of this dunderhead's mouth.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Gee, Squidward, maybe Santa will bring me a dictionary so I can understand what you just said. Okay, everybody, we've got a lot to do now that we've summoned Santa Claus. We must ready ourselves for his arrival.

speaker: Everyone
line: Hooray!

speaker: Patchy
line: Is Squidward right? Can there be a Christmas under the sea? Stay tuned! [shaking, putting his hand and hook upon his ears. later] It's about time you got back! Now I can finish me story! So, SpongeBob was sending the last of the letters to Santa...

speaker: Martin
line: I hope he can read Portuguese.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Ahh, that's the last letter. Huh? Wait! Squidward hasn't written his letter yet! [runs to Squidward with a pencil, bottles, and paper in hand] Squidward! Hurry! Squidward, Squidward! Hurry! [runs into Squidward's house and upstairs to have him write his letter]

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob, what are you doing?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Don't worry, Squidward. I'll help you get started. [writes letter for Squidward] Dear Santa Claus...

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob, forget it.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Right, too formal. Hi Santa...

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob, no.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Howdy, Claus?

speaker: Squidward
line: [pushes SpongeBob out his door] I'm not writing a letter to a figment of your imagination.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But, Squidward, when Santa comes, you'll be the only one without a gift.

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob, how many times do I have to say it? I don't believe in Santa Claus!

speaker: Squidward
line: My self-respect. My sanity. My lunch. [closes door]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Squidward, c'mon. [everyone tries to get Squidward outside]

speaker: Squidward
line: [pokes his head out his window] Santa Claus is a big phony! SpongeBob has got you all fooled.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: C'mon, Squidward. C'mon! [closes window and gets in bed]

speaker: Fred
line: Hey! Where's Santa?

speaker: Citizens
line: Oh, c'mon. Enough of this. [everyone argues]

speaker: Fred
line: Thanks for the lies, Mr. Fairytale! Let's go waste our time somewhere else.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey, guys, where's your Christmas Spirit? He's just running late.

speaker: Patrick
line: He probably just stopped for a snack! Fat guys get hungry right?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Yeah! [they wait and wait and then one of the jellyfish jars break on SpongeBob's head]

speaker: Patrick
line: Never trust a genie. [Patrick and a snowman walk away]

speaker: Squidward
line: [alarm goes off] Ahh, morning already? Oh, boy! [speaking in a megaphone] Merry Christmas! Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas. Wait. Oh, I see a great Christmas photo op. Could you move in a little? Say Santa Claus.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [very sad face] Santa Claus. [Squidward takes picture]

speaker: Squidward
line: Aww, our first Christmas. This Christmas feels like the very first Christmas. The first Christmas is this Christmas. [donkey appears on screen making noises] Cause it feels like the first Christmas to me. [laughing at SpongeBob]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You were right, Squidward. This is a stupid holiday. [cries; takes out a present] I still want you to have this.

speaker: Squidward
line: What? What's this?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: A present. I made it for you so you wouldn't be left out when... Santa came! "[cries some more]"

speaker: Squidward
line: Oh, gee, I, uh, you know I...

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You're welcome. "[sadly walks off and cries]"

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob? He made me a present? It's probably a jellyfish net, or an old Krabby patty, or... [imitates a hillbilly] his favorite underpants. Haha. [opens present] Why, it looks like a clarinet. [smells it] It smells like one, too. Handcrafted on driftwood. And it's even got my name on it. [finds a button that says "push"] What's this? [pushes the button and 3 wooden Squidwards with clarinets come out and bob up and down] Wow. This is the greatest gift I've ever gotten. Oh, I feel like a... I feel like a... I feel like a... [donkey appears on screen and makes noises] big jerk. What have I done to poor SpongeBob? Uh, hey, SpongeBob? I... SpongeBob?  [SpongeBob is on a ladder trying to get his lights down]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I guess I won't be needing this. [slides down with the lights in hand] That's better. [a gray cloud comes and rains on SpongeBob]

speaker: Squidward
line: Poor little guy. All he wanted was to spread a little joy.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I better get this stuff off of Squid's house.

speaker: Squidward
line: Ho, ho, ho! Ho, ho, ho!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Huh? Hello? Who's there? Huh? Hello?

speaker: Squidward
line: Ho, ho, ho! Ho, ho, ho!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hello? Yes. Who's there? Huh? Hello? Show yourself. Yoo-hoo. Hello? Who is it? Huh?

speaker: Squidward
line: Up here you dunce. [looks like Santa Claus] I mean, uh, Merry Christmas little boy.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [gasps] C-c-could it be?

speaker: Squidward
line: Yes, it is I, Santa Claus. Ho, ho, ho... [slips off the roof and hits the ground]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey, you're S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-San... [takes a deep breath] S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-San... [takes a deep breath] S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-San...

speaker: Squidward
line: Hey, uh, kid, take it easy.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-San... ta... [faints]

speaker: Squidward
line: SpongeBob? SpongeBob? SpongeBob?!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: S-S-S-S-S-S-S-S-San...

speaker: Squidward
line: Don't do that again.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I knew you'd make it, Santa. Hey, Santa, where's your big, round belly.

speaker: Squidward
line: Well, that, um, is a result of, uh, undersea pressure on my body.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Where's your reindeer? And your flying machine?

speaker: Squidward
line: Uhh, I loaned them to the Easter bunny.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: And what about that nose? [pokes his nose and laughs] I knew you were suppose to have a big one but, that things gigantic. [laughs]

speaker: Squidward
line: Alright! I'm Santa.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [glues a jump onto Santa] Santa! This is the greatest you could've given me. Thank you for bringing Christmas to Bikini Bottom.

speaker: Squidward
line: I didn't bring Christmas to Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob; you did.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I did? [faints and falls on Gary's shell]

speaker: Gary
line: Meow.

speaker: Squidward
line: Merry Christmas, SpongeBob. Merry Christmas! Whew! I'm glad that's over.

speaker: Shelly
line: Do you have a present for me, Santa?

speaker: Squidward
line: Oh, well, uhh, you see, I'm not really...

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [laughs] Go ahead, Santa Claus. See, he is real. He made my Christmas wish come true, he won't let you down.

speaker: Squidward
line: Uhh, right, just a second. [searches in his house for stuff] C'mon, let's see. What do little girls like? A box of matches? Or a shaving kit? A copy of my birth certificate? There's got to be something around here. Think. Think. Think. Ha! Perfect! [hands the little girl a wrench] There you go, little girl! Ho, ho, ho!

speaker: Shelly
line: Thanks, Santa. [scratches the wrench like it was a puppy]

speaker: Squidward
line: That almost felt good. [Squidward then notices a long line of citizens waiting for presents] I didn't... who?

speaker: Fred
line: Hey, Santa, where's my present?

speaker: Old Man Jenkins
line: And mine!

speaker: Abigail-Marge
line: And what about me?

speaker: Squidward
line: Uhh... let's see what Santa has for all you good people. [searches for stuff in his house] Think fast, Santa. Gifts for good people. A-ha! A bowl of mashed potatoes for you.

speaker: Jennifer-Millie
line: Thank you, Santa. This is just what I wanted. [puts bowl on her head] A new hairstyle.

speaker: Squidward
line: [gives the little girl two forks and gives Patrick a clock] Here you go, Patrick.

speaker: Patrick
line: Wow. [punches a hole through the clock] A wrist watch.

speaker: Squidward
line: [gets everything else in his house to the citizens] What was I thinking? I gave away all my stuff just 'cause SpongeBob wouldn't be sad. Am I insane? [SpongeBob knocks on the door] You might as well take the door. It's all that's left.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Squidward! You missed him! He was here just like I said! He gave us all presents. He was jolly and he had a beard. His nose was big and he had rosy cheeks. He was friendly and kind. [turns SpongeBob towards the door and pushes him so he walks] And Santa is... oh, his belly was small but his nose was huge with Christmas joy. He was so nice Squidward...

speaker: Squidward
line: Well, at least it's over. [notices a bottle with a letter in it on the ground] Huh? What's this?

speaker: Santa
line: Dear Squidward, thanks for all your help! You've been a real good boy this year. Warm regards, Santa Claus. [letter disappears into thin air] Ho, ho, ho! Ho, ho, ho! [in his sleigh flying] Ho, ho, ho, ho, ho. Merry Christmas! Ho, ho, ho, ho, ho. Ho, ho, ho, ho. [does a crazy dance while saying his "ho ho ho"]

speaker: Squidward
line: Yup, I'm insane. [plays his wooden clarinet in the ending tone of the episode]

speaker: Santa
line: Merry Christmas! [back at Patchy's house, a sailboat with a homemade Sponge and Pat moves in front of a picture of the island, which has a bunch of presents on it]

speaker: Patchy
line: Dee dee, dee dee dee dee. [in Sponge's voice] Ahoy, Patrick! It's Christmas Island! [in Pat's voice] Presents, ahoy! [in Sponge's voice] Hooray! [he starts making storm sound effects] Oh, a storm! [in Pat's voice] Yay! I mean yikes! [he makes more sound effects and begins speaking in his own voice] Oh, we're going down! [He keeps making noises. Zoom out to show the boat is on Patchy's head] Trim the sails! Hoist the yardarms! Turn on the Weather Channel! [he screams]

speaker: Man on Set
line: [off-screen] Patchy!

speaker: Patchy
line: Oh, hi kids. Boy, that SpongeBob makes me as jolly as a roger. Well, I hope you enjoyed SpongeBob's Christmas tale. And I hope your Christmas is better than sunken treasure. [He takes the boat off his head. Potty flies out, and there is a nest was under him, and in it are a few eggs wrapped in bows. Patchy picks one up] Aw... Potty left me a little Christmas present. [He laughs. Then he goes over to the mistletoe] Arr, ye old mistletoe. And you know what that means. [he sprays breath freshener in his mouth] Ah, time for somebody to kiss Patchy the Pirate! [he makes kissing noises] Come on, who's it gonna be? Come on! Kiss the captain! [He laughs. Potty flies over and squawks. Patchy screams]

speaker: Potty
line: Give us a kiss! [Patchy goes to avoid him]

speaker: Patchy
line: No! No, not you! [Potty keeps flying around squawking] No, not you Potty! Get out of here! No, Potty! I don't wanna kiss you! No, we talked about this! Potty! No!

speaker: Potty
line: Kissy, kissy!

speaker: Narrator
line: Well, it looks like Patchy's pretty busy at the moment, so I'll say it for him. Good night, and happy holidays.

speaker: [the words "Happy Holidays" are spelled out on screen]
[SpongeBob and Patrick are running down the block jumping up and down, disfiguring themselves in the process]
SpongeBob
line: [hyperactive, in time with Patrick] Alright, we're gonna go to Sandy's house! Yeah! Ha-ha! Keep the tree warm, Sandy, we're on our way to your house! Ha-ha-ha...

speaker: Patrick
line: [hyperactive, in time with SpongeBob] Yay! Yay! Ha-ha! I'm gonna beat you there! I'm gonna... ah, it's gonna be fun! Ah-ha...

speaker: [They freeze in mid-run when they see Sandy's treedome is enclosed with metal walls. The two walk up to the door, which has a "Keep Out" sign on it]
SpongeBob
line: Sandy? [they enter] Hey Sandy, what's with the sign?

speaker: [the two walk up to a TV which shows Sandy in a pink nightgown eating acorns]
Patrick
line: Look, she's on the Eating Channel.

speaker: Sandy
line: [On TV. Sandy fills her cheeks with acorns and swallows, wincing in pain as the giant mass of acorns passes down her long, thin neck and into her small torso, deforming it as it goes] Howdy! [eats more nuts] If y'all are watching this, that means I'm asleep for the winter. This sleep is called hibernation. ["HIBERNATION" appears on the bottom of the screen. Sandy eats more nuts] During hibernation, animals don't like to be woken up. So do not disturb. [sternly] That means you, SpongeBob.

speaker: [Patrick turns the TV off and puts on SpongeBob's water helmet and his own]
Patrick
line: We better put these on.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Never mind, Pat. Sandy said not to come in. Let's am-scray.

speaker: [Patrick pushes the button, letting all the water drain out of the front foyer]
Patrick
line: When are you gonna learn, SpongeBob? "No" means "yes"!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick, listen, how many times do we have to-?

speaker: Patrick
line: SpongeBob, look at this! [snow falls in and covers the bottom of the treedome. SpongeBob gasps and walks in]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What is this stuff? [pan around the treedome]

speaker: Patrick
line: It's a vast, swirling wonderland of sparkling white pleasure. Let it fill your senses with cascading, fluffy pillows of excitement and comfort as you've never felt before.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [teary-eyed] Wow, Pat, that was beautiful!

speaker: Patrick
line: What, I was just reading this candy bar wrapper, see? [he hands SpongeBob the wrapper. SpongeBob gasps]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick! Put your helmet back on! [Pat has taken his helmet off and is eating the snowflakes] You know there's no water in Sandy's house!

speaker: Patrick
line: It's okay, SpongeBob. This stuff is water! Look! [Patrick lets a flake land on his tongue and it melts into water]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I guess you're right. It's okay here!

speaker: Patrick
line: Take it off. No one's looking. [SpongeBob does so and the two cheer and burrow themselves in the snow. They pop back up with noses made of snow. Then, they hear a weird sound] SpongeBob, did you hear that?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I think it came from Sandy's tree.

speaker: Patrick
line: That is one tired tree.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Let's check it out. [cut to inside Sandy's tree where SpongeBob and Patrick come in. They both gasp] Look what's in Sandy's bed! [they walk over to the bed, where Sandy is asleep in hibernation form, looking like some weird squirrel-like monster]

speaker: Patrick
line: Looks like an over-inflated Sandy doll!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I think this thing is Sandy.

speaker: Patrick
line: Hibernation must mean the opposite of beauty sleep.

speaker: Sandy
line: [snoring, talking in sleep] I've had enough of your dastardly deeds, Dirty Dan. I'm gonna get you and your partner, Pinhead Larry or my name ain't Sheriff... Sandy... [snores]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [giggles] She must be dreaming about Texas outlaws. [the two giggle] Look out Sandy, I'm Dirty Dan.

speaker: Sandy
line: I'm gonna catch you and throw you in jail at taxpayers' expense.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh, you better run faster, Sandy.

speaker: Patrick
line: Yeah! I'm getting away! Faster! [Sandy moves her arms and legs]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hurry, we're getting in a taxi!

speaker: Patrick
line: Faster, faster! [the two giggle]

speaker: Sandy
line: I'll get you two. You're nothing but pure evil! Just like newspaper comics... [snores off to sleep, the two giggle again]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Come on, Patrick. We shouldn't disturb her anymore.

speaker: Patrick
line: That's not disturbing. This is disturbing! [Patrick struggles to create a talking face that protrudes from his back] Hi there, SpongeBob. My name is Patback.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Ha! That is really disturbing!

speaker: [the two laugh uncontrollably. Cut to Sandy, her eye shoots open. A giant shadow looms over SpongeBob and Patrick. Patrick stops laughing while SpongeBob continues to laugh]
Patrick
line: Uh, SpongeBob?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [stops laughing] Huh? [Sandy is really mad now, she's steaming and roaring. Sponge and Pat run, but Sandy has them both by the their underwear and gives them an extreme wedgie. They run in mid-air anyway]

speaker: Patrick
line: Faster, SpongeBob! She's gaining on us!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [Crying from the pain of the wedgie.] Sandy! No! Stop!

speaker: Sandy
line: I warned ya, Dirty Dan! Now, you've just crossed the border into Hurtville!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sandy, it's us, your friends! SpongeBob and Patrick!

speaker: Patrick
line: Please, Sandy, I can't afford dry cleaning!

speaker: Sandy
line: Gonna skin y'all and make a pair of size six...boots... [she falls asleep and drops the two. They inch away and see Sandy fall back into her bed]

speaker: Patrick
line: Fun's over.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Whew, we sure don't want to wake her up again. Too bad we don't have any earplugs to put on her.

speaker: Patrick
line: Yeah, all's I got is this bellybutton lint. [he takes the lint out of its designated area. It somehow forms into the shape of earmuffs]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: All right, Pat! [he takes them and crawls over to the bed. Pat follows. Sponge puts the earmuffs on Sandy]

speaker: Sandy
line: I'm gonna rip your arms off and.... flapjacks? [snores]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, that oughta work.

speaker: Patrick
line: [loudly] Hey Sandy, does it work? [Sponge and Pat look at each other and raise their eyebrows repeatedly and in symmetry]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey Sandy, if you can't hear us, don't say anything!

speaker: Patrick
line: Hey, Sandy! Don't wake up! [the two giggle, Sponge holds a megaphone up to Sandy's head and yells into it]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: See ya later, Sheriff Sandy! [laughs, the two run down to the snowy plains and act like outlaws, with that drawling voice] You're under arrest!

speaker: Patrick
line: You'll never catch me! [he giggle and makes a snowball and throws it at SpongeBob's face. They both laugh. Pat starts to make another one, but he's hit by a giant mound of snow. SpongeBob stands on a giant snow cannon] Hey that's not fair! Cowboys couldn't afford cannons.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: They couldn't afford station wagons either! [A giant snowball shaped like a station wagon lands on Patrick]

speaker: Patrick
line: Nice paneling.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: All right, Pinhead. Your time is up! [cut to Pat, who looks like a cone-head]

speaker: Patrick
line: Who you calling Pinhead? I want to be Dirty Dan!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What makes you think you can be Dirty Dan?

speaker: Patrick
line: I'm dirty. [he's hit on the head by a giant snow shovel that Sponge has]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I say I'm Dirty Dan. [Pat runs off and returns with a giant bat with a nail in it made of snow]

speaker: Patrick
line: I say I'm Dirty Dan! [whacks SpongeBob with it]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [whacks Patrick again] I say I'm Dirty Dan!

speaker: Patrick
line: [whacks SpongeBob] I'm Dirty Dan.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [whacks Patrick] I'm Dirty Dan!

speaker: Patrick
line: [whacks SpongeBob] I'm Dirty Dan.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [whacks Patrick] I'm Dirty Dan!

speaker: Patrick
line: [whacks SpongeBob] I'm Dirty Dan.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [whacks Patrick] I'm Dirty Dan!

speaker: [Inside the tree, Sandy blissfully sleeps until the repeated impacts cause the earmuffs to fall off.]
Patrick
line: [whacks SpongeBob] I'm Dirty Dan.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [whacks Patrick] I'm Dirty Dan!

speaker: Patrick
line: [whacks SpongeBob] I'm Dirty Dan.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [whacks Patrick] I'm Dirty Dan! [Sandy's eyes snap open] [Cut back to outside]

speaker: Patrick
line: [whacks SpongeBob] I'm Dirty Dan. [SpongeBob sees something behind Patrick and screams in terror] Screaming will get you no- [Sandy reaches out and grabs the top of Patrick's head and rips it off. Sandy huffs and growls as she stands behind Patrick, towering over him with sharpened teeth bared in a snarl]

speaker: Sandy
line: [breathing heavily] Which one of you fellers is the real Dirty Dan?!

speaker: Patrick
line: Uh? I am? [ Bad idea, as Sandy promptly backhands him and sends him flying across the treedome]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Patrick! [Pat slams against the dome hard enough to leave a dent and little drumsticks float around his head]

speaker: Patrick
line: Hot wings? [cut back to Sandy, who rounds on a cowering and terrified SpongeBob.]

speaker: Sandy
line: Okay, Pinhead Larry, now you get yours! [SpongeBob's pupils shrink in fear and he screams and legs it seconds before Sandy's fist obliterates where he was just sitting. Sandy throws her head back and bellows] Pinhead! [SpongeBob whimpers and runs, Sandy is close behind. SpongeBob later doesn't seem to be going far because he's right in front of Sandy on the exercise wheel. He slips and gets flung across the wheel. He flies off and slams into the picnic table, leaving a giant crater in its place. Sandy leans over the crater] Now you're gonna pay for those crimes, Pinhead! [SpongeBob picks up a wood board]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sandy, stay back. I'm warning ya! [Sandy roars right in Sponge's face] Okay, I warned ya! [SpongeBob throws the wooden board, Patrick pops up beside Sandy]

speaker: Patrick
line: Did you win? [he's hit by the board and rolls down the crater to Sponge's feet] Hi, SpongeBob! [Sandy growls before leaping into the crater. SpongeBob and Patrick cling onto each other in fear for their lives as a huge shadow covers them before a cloud obscures them, presumably simulating a fight. Cut to the treedome at night where two gravestones are in front of Sandy's Treedome one for Dirty Dan and one for Pinhead Larry. Pat and Sponge come up from under the snow in respective tombstone order] Okay, SpongeBob, you can be Dirty Dan. I just wanna be Patrick!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Let's get out of here before Sandy wakes up again! [the two run to the door and SpongeBob tries to open it, but his hands slip off the wheel and accidentally hits Patrick in the face]

speaker: Patrick
line: Ouch! [covers his eyes in pain]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Sorry, Patrick, but the door is slippery! It's frozen shut!

speaker: Patrick
line: Let me have a try. [he goes up to the door and spits on both hands, preparing to open the door] Open sesame! [nothing happens, Patrick shrugs] Well, I've done all I can do.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Then we're stuck in here? until the door thaws? in spring.

speaker: Patrick
line: Barnacles. [cut to much later, where Sponge and Pat are completely buried in snow, shivering and blue] Is it spring yet?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: N-n-n-no. [Pat and Sponge's snow covering on their faces breaks off]

speaker: Patrick
line: I'm so cold that I'm shivering! [a piece of Pat's side of his head cracks off, revealing his brain. Sponge snaps off his two nose drippings and clicks them together]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I'm so cold that I can use my nose drippings as a pair of chopsticks!

speaker: Patrick
line: I'm so cold that...I'm shivering!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Maybe we should build a fire. I got it! We'll burn the bark from Sandy's tree! [Sponge begins to pull a strip of bark off the tree but he's stopped by Sandy's booming voice]

speaker: Sandy
line: [off-screen] You're gonna be wearing an iron lung when I'm through with you, Pinhead! [Sponge quickly puts the strip back on and puts masking-tape on it. Sponge goes back to Pat]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: The fire's not gonna happen, Patrick. I don't get it! How does Sandy survive these intense conditions every year?

speaker: Patrick
line: Maybe she just ignores it.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Maybe?

speaker: Patrick
line: Maybe?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Maybe it's her fur! [cut to a shot of a real-life squirrel]

speaker: SpongeBob and Patrick
line: Yeah! [cut to inside the tree where Sponge and Pat marvel at Sandy's fur]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Look at all that warm, toasty fur!

speaker: Patrick
line: It's like a gold mine, but with fur. [SpongeBob slowly prepares to pluck a hair off Sandy]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Carefully...carefully? [Pat smacks him]

speaker: Patrick
line: Come on, do it! I'm freezing here!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: All right, all right, hang on a second! [he plucks one hair off and Sandy jumps up from her sleep and roars ferociously. Then goes back to sleep] That should be enough, right? [Pat takes the hair]

speaker: Patrick
line: Sponge, I'm a big man. A big, BIG man!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, I guess I've lived a full life! [he plucks one more hair, causing the same reaction with Sandy]

speaker: Patrick
line: This is taking too long! I want the warm NOW! [he takes a piece of masking tape, places it on Sandy]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Pat, no! [Patrick rips a patch of Sandy's fur off with the tape, leaving a patch of bare skin. Sandy roars and goes back to sleep]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Pat, are you crazy?! [we see Pat has placed the fur on his forehead]

speaker: Patrick
line: No, I'm warm.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Let me see that roll of tape.

speaker: [as we pan out from the tree, we hear the tape ripping out Sandy's fur and her roaring. Cut to later, Pat comes out of the tree with a strip of hair on his forehead and his pants full of fur. Sponge comes out with a weird fur hairdo and a goatee]
Patrick
line: Man, that fur really hits the spot! No more frozen armpits. [he lifts his arm up, revealing fur under it]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: And this eyebrow/goatee combo works like a charm. This is the best idea we've ever had.

speaker: Patrick
line: You said it!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I'm ready for the longest, coldest winter ever!

speaker: Both
line: Bring it on!

speaker: [just then, all the snow stops and melts. It's springtime again, flowers bloom]
SpongeBob
line: Spring?

speaker: Sandy
line: [off screen. yawns] Wow, spring already?

speaker: [SpongeBob and Pat run frantically to the door, but it hasn't thawed yet]
SpongeBob
line: Tartar sauce! The lock is still frozen!

speaker: Sandy
line: [off-screen] I sure can't wait to go outside and warm my fur!

speaker: [SpongeBob and Pat frantically blow on the door handle until it melts. Sandy peeks out the window]
Sandy
line: Oh look, it's SpongeBob and Patrick!

speaker: [with that, SpongeBob and Patrick go crazy trying to open the door. Sandy walks over, completely hairless and in her bikini]
Sandy
line: Hey, guys!

speaker: [She sees all the different fur assortments the two are wearing. She looks down at her bald pink body and screams]
SpongeBob
line: It's okay, Sandy. Squirrel pattern baldness is quite common in small mammals! [Pat hides his furry forehead piece. Sandy is really ticked now]

speaker: Sandy
line: [growling with fury] SpongeBob... Patrick...

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Don't worry, Sandy, we've got you covered.

speaker: [He giggles nervously. Cut to Sandy's arm pouring some lemonade, she giggles]
Sandy
line: [giggles] More lemonade, boys? [pan out to see that Patrick is curled around Sandy's head and SpongeBob is curled around Sandy's body, in order to cover up her bald pink hide. The two take a glass]

speaker: SpongeBob & Patrick
line: Thanks, Sandy.

speaker: Sandy
line: Spring sure is lovely.

speaker: [It's another great day in Bikini Bottom. Gary is out in a clearing and SpongeBob tiptoes over to a rock behind him giggling. He looks from behind it]
SpongeBob
line: Oh, I've got ya now, Gary.

speaker: Gary
line: Meow? [SpongeBob jumps up and lands in mid-air. He touches Gary's shell with his index finger]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Tag, you're it! [he runs off, SpongeBob jumps and he opens his mouth. He flies to his house and chomps down on the side of it, leaving him clinging. garbled] Gary will never find me here! [Gary crawls over the ground, up the house and toward SpongeBob] Uh-oh. [Gary's eye substitutes as an arm as he tags SpongeBob and meows] Tag! Now I'm it! [he laughs uncontrollably as he slides down the wall, scraping off two slices of the covering with his teeth. Patrick is below and Sponge takes the shavings out of his teeth]

speaker: Patrick
line: Hi SpongeBob, what are you doing?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Gary and I are playing tag, you wanna join us?

speaker: Patrick
line: Oh boy, would I!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [slyly] OK, [touches him] Tag, you're it! [walks away]

speaker: Patrick
line: I'm it! I'm it, I'm it, I'm it, I'm it! [Gary is still there, and he meows. Patrick tags him] Tag, you're it! I win, I win! [Gary purrs and rubs against Patrick. Then he crawls all around Patrick's body. SpongeBob walks over] What's with Gary? He sounds like a motor boat! [laughs]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: That's just a snail's way of saying he likes you!

speaker: Patrick
line: [laughs] It tickles! [the two laugh endlessly as Gary continues to crawl around. They continue laughing and laughing until it's dark]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Well, I guess it's time for me and the Gar-Bear to get going. Come on, Gary. [he pulls Gary off of Patrick and walks away] Boy, I can't wait to hit the hay. [Patrick waves] What about you, Gary? [SpongeBob sees that he's no longer holding Gary] Gary? Gary? [cut to Patrick's house where the rock is up and Patrick's brushing his teeth and looking in a mirror on the side of the wall. He has his nightcap on]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey Patrick, have you seen Gary?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Come on Gary, we gotta let Patrick go to sleep.

speaker: Patrick
line: Well, I don't mind SpongeBob. In fact, why don't you Gary stay over at my house tonight?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey, that's a great idea!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Gee, this is great. My two best friends in the whole sea having a sleepover.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: OK, you two have a good time. I'll see you tomorrow. [they wave good-bye and SpongeBob walks home]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I'm awake!

speaker: Patrick
line: [off-screen] Hey, SpongeBob! [SpongeBob leaps up and runs to the window. Patrick and Gary are outside]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey guys, how was the sleepover?

speaker: Patrick
line: Great, SpongeBob. Watch this! Wherever I go, Gary follows! [he pulls Gary off his chest and runs. Gary goes after him as he runs around SpongeBob's house. He runs on top of his house and falls off and continues running, which Gary then imitates] See? [SpongeBob jumps from the window and runs off]

speaker: Patrick
line: Come on Gary, let's play a different game. [he and Gary walk away. SpongeBob jumps in front of Gary]

speaker: Patrick
line: Hold it right there, DadMom AngryPants!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What's that supposed to mean?

speaker: Patrick
line: I don't know, but I do know Gary knows who he wants to go with. So I suggest that you put him down and let him choose. [SpongeBob does]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Fine, but I would like to remind him who it was who fed him and housed him and sat on his bedside when he was sick and massaged his eyestalks when his eyes were sore! OK, Gary, go ahead, show him. OK Gary, come to me! Come on, come on, Gary! Come on, come here, Gary! [Gary turns around to Patrick] Uh, wrong way Gary. [Ignoring, Gary is crawling toward Patrick] G-Gary, turn around! Gary, no, Gary, no, no, no! Don't do it, Gary! [he collapses as Gary crawls up to Patrick]

speaker: Lary
line: [in a deeper voice than Gary's] Meow. [Cut to Lary sitting at a table as SpongeBob walks over with a plate with a cover on it. SpongeBob is in chef garb]

speaker: Patrick
line: Hi SpongeBob.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh, hello, Patrick.

speaker: Gary
line: Meow.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hello, Gary.

speaker: Patrick
line: Would it be all right if me and Gary did some laundry around here?

speaker: Patrick
line: And uh, SpongeBob, could we borrow some soap?

speaker: Patrick
line: I'm sorry, SpongeBob. But Gary's with me now. You had your chance and you failed. You have to stop living in the past. Face it SpongeBob, you're only hurting yourself. [he takes off his shorts and puts them in the machine; Gary crawls in after them] It's what Gary wants, and what Gary wants is me! Right, Gary? [the two notice Gary is in the machine, nudging in Patrick's shorts] He only liked me for my shorts!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No, Patrick. He wanted the cookie in your pocket! [Gary is indeed eating the cookie. He finishes and crawls out up to SpongeBob]

speaker: Gary
line: Meow.

speaker: Patrick
line: Gary? I thought what we had was special...!

speaker: [It's another day at Mrs. Puff's Boating School as SpongeBob skids along his way to failing his driving test again]
Narrator
line: Here we are again at the Bikini Bottom Boating School. Today is once again the day of SpongeBob's boating school exam. But more importantly, this is the last test for the year, [cut to a shot of SpongeBob and Mrs. Puff's car coming straight to the camera] and if SpongeBob does not pass this one, it means [starts going into a screaming tone] another whole year of boating school! [Shows a static scene as SpongeBob crashes into the camera and glass breaks. Back on regular view, the cameraman is seen to have fallen over. Narrator groans.]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What happened?

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Oh, nothing SpongeBob, you just struck another pedestrian. [writes on clipboard] Minus 20 more points.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: How many does that leave me with?

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Negative 224.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: How many more minutes left in the test?

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: The test is over.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: That's enough time, I can make up those points! [Sponge is about to pull into reverse]

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: No, SpongeBob, you didn't hear me! [the boat rams into reverse and Mrs. Puff screams.] It's too late, SpongeBob! [Mrs. Puff pleads Sponge to stop as Sponge knocks over a whole row of cones, knocks through a brick wall and crashes in front of the school's main building. The dust clears]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: OK, Mrs. Puff, what's my final score?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Whoo! And how many do I need to pass?

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Six.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [raising arms slowly] Whoo.

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Hundred. [SpongeBob stops]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What?

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: 600. You need 600 to pass. You got 6.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Don't worry, I'll be all right Mrs. Puff. Besides, this means that I get to be in your class for a whole 'nother year! [he slams his fist down, which causes a piece of the motor to fly upward] Well, see you next Tuesday! [Sponge walks off and the piece crashes on Mrs. Puff. She inflates like she always does when Sponge crashes. SpongeBob runs out to his unicycle-like bike] Yeah! [singing] I'm gonna get my driver's license and it's only gonna take one more year, one more year, one more superduper year. [goes around in circles on his bike] One more super-spectacular, extra-magical, extra-fantastical year! [Mrs. Puff looks on, still inflated]

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: [thinking] Oh, Neptune. Another year with him! Barnacles! Dirty barnacles! I've got to do something to save myself. Oh, there's only one way out a teacher's ace in the hole! [starts to talk, when she does, she deflates to her normal size] Extra crediiiiit!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What was that, Mrs. Puff? [Mrs. Puff runs over and shakes him in joy]

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Extra credit, SpongeBob! The extra credit! [laughing wildly] I still have a chance! I mean, you still have a chance.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What's extra credit?

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: It's when you get credit for the things you weren't able to do before.

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Now, are we ready for that extra credit?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Extra credit!

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: That's the spirit. So all you have to do to earn your extra credit and pass my class and never have to go anywhere near this school again, is to write a 10-word sentence on what you've learned in boating school.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But I've learned so many things.

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: What's wrong?

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Give me that! Here's a pen.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: A pen! One of the most permanent of all writing utensils. [walks back to desk singing] Gonna write an essay, that's what I say. [SpongeBob finishes] There.

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Fantastic, let me see it.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No, wait! I changed my mind! [erases some stuff out]

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: I'm sure whatever you've written is fine, just let me see. [Sponge jumps on top of his paper]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Don't look! It's not ready.

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: It's so simple, only 10 words! "What I learned in boating school is blankity, blankity, [her eyes grow bulging veins] Blank!"

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I can do this! I can do this!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I can do this! I can do this! [starts to pant] Is it hot in here, Mrs. Puff? Why is it so hot in here? [screams] My hand is cramping, Mrs. Puff! Make it stop! [Mrs. Puff jumps on Sponge and forces the pen to push on the paper]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: It's not ready yet.

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: It's OK, SpongeBob. Show the teacher what you've written.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No!

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Give it to me! [the 2 pull on it]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Mrs. Puff, I don't feel like I really did anything.

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: That's how extra credit is supposed to feel.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Really?

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Besides, here's your license. [gives it to SpongeBob]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: My license! [licks it] It tastes just like I dreamt it would. Mrs. Puff, I-

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: [dragging him out the door] Thank you, SpongeBob. Congratulations, and have a nice life!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Look out Bikini Bottom! There's a new driver on the road and his name is...SpongeBob SquarePants. [echoes] SpongeBob SquarePants. SpongeBob SquarePants. [fades to a vision of Mrs. Puff's fears] La La La La! [he hits many pedestrians] La La La La! [he crashes through Harold and Frank]

speaker: Fish
line: [crushed by the bus when SpongeBob hits it] Ow!

speaker: [A small birthday party is going on]
Partygoers
line: Harris, happy birthday! [SpongeBob runs over them] My leg!

speaker: News Reporter
line: So much destruction...this reporter asks, "Why?" Local consensus places the blame on this negligent, selfish driving instructor who- [SpongeBob runs him over] Oof!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: La la la la!

speaker: Reporter
line: Let's- not- use that take. [Fades to reality]

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: That's preposterous. He did the extra credit. There's no need to worry. He doesn't even have a boat to drive. [Later that night while walking home] Now to go home and have the rest of that pasta.

speaker: [she opens the door and turns on the light to see the SquarePants Family standing in the center of her living room with a huge round cake in the middle saying, "Thank You, Mrs. Puff! "]
The SquarePants'
line: Surprise!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: To the greatest teacher ever!

speaker: Mr. SquarePants
line: Thank you, Mrs Puff. I know I speak for everyone when I say that we consider you a member of the SquarePants family. [kisses her hand for a long while]

speaker: Mrs. SquarePants
line: I think you made your point, Dear.

speaker: Mr. SquarePants
line: Ahem. [blushes, and walks back to the family] Mrs. Puff, we were starting to think SpongeBob was never going to get his license. But you never gave up on him, you never quit, you never took the easy way out!

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Well, I...Okay.

speaker: Mrs. SquarePants
line: We wanted to make sure Mrs. Puff, the greatest driving teacher in the world, was here to see this...

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: See what?

speaker: Mr. SquarePants
line: Ta-da! [reading back license plate "IM-RDY"]

speaker: Mrs. Puff and SpongeBob
line: A brand new boatmobile?!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: For me...? [faints and hits the cake, cutting out a perfect square. The family is in the car ready to drive away with SpongeBob still passed out in the backseat]

speaker: Mrs. SquarePants
line: Don't worry, Mrs. Puff...He'll be driving by tomorrow! Toodle-Loo!

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: What have I done?! Everyone will know I let him slide through school! I'll have to move to new city, start a new boating school with a new name! No. Not again. I've got to end this before it begins.

speaker: [In SpongeBob's bedroom, he's laying in bed with his parents overlooking him]
Mr. SquarePants
line: You took quite a buster there, Son.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: What I learned in Boating School today is!

speaker: Mr. SquarePants
line: We're gonna hafta hold off on the driving there for a while, son.

speaker: Mrs. SquarePants
line: That's right Honey. Now, just stay in bed, and no going near the boat!

speaker: [SpongeBob peeks out to see if it's all clear, then slides through the window and floats to his new boat]
SpongeBob
line: Hi, Boaty. [he runs his hand on the side of the boat and gasps] Boaty, you're cold! [he stands up and lays his socks on the side of the door] Take my socks. [he jumps on the side and hugs it] Oh Boaty, I'm always going to take care of you. You're the best boat in the deep blue sea! [he kisses the throttle lever, sighs, then falls asleep. On the horizon, a shifty dark figure runs by. It's Mrs. Puff, wearing a black ski mask. She peeks over and jumps into the boat, checking to see if the coast is clear]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey, I'm driving! [the two notice each other and scream. Mrs. Puff skids off the road for a bit, then returns to normal. SpongeBob jumps up] Who are you and what are you doing with my boat? And why are you wearing that ski mask?! Because you're not skiing! [gasp] Oh my gosh, I know who you are!

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: [nervous] No, you don't! You don't know who I am!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Yes I do! I know that you're...a boat-jacker! I never thought I'd have to use this pepper spray. [takes it out. He sprays, but it's pointed the wrong way and it gets in his eyes and he screams] Somebody help me! Somebody help me! [Mrs. Puff kicks SpongeBob out of the boat]

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Sorry SpongeBob, but it was for your own good. [we see SpongeBob supposedly running next to the boat, but he's actually riding his bike. Mrs. Puff speeds up faster and loses him]

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: Looks like that got rid of him. Now for some tunes. [she turns on the radio, which bears a striking resemblance to SpongeBob. It is SpongeBob, in the shape of a radio his eyes are knobs, mouth the speaker, and so on]

speaker: SpongeBob as Radio
line: And now back to KRUD with all of your personal "you won't get away with stealing my car!" hits. [Mrs. Puff screams as SpongeBob squeezes out of the box and jumps on Mrs. Puff. They get into a giant brawl and the car goes out of control. Two cops look on]

speaker: Cop 1
line: Hey, look. [the car then flies off a cliff and straight for the squad car. The two policemen scream as they are now scared out of their wits. While plummeting, SpongeBob and Mrs. Puff are still brawling]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: So, I guess I got to give my license back, huh?

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: I hear Mrs. Flounder is starting a new class Monday morning.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: You kidding? You're the only teacher for this student [cut to see that Mrs. Puff is talking to SpongeBob from jail, through that visiting window]. And besides, the warden said she'll let you go early, if you do her a favor?

speaker: Mrs. Puff
line: What's that? [pan out from the jail exterior]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [from inside] Free driving lessons! [laughs]

speaker: [SpongeBob and Patrick are at the Jellyfish Convention, where everything is about jellyfish. SpongeBob is wearing a jellyfish hat, Patrick is wearing a net on his head]
SpongeBob
line: Wow! We're actually here at the biannual Jellyfish Convention!

speaker: Patrick
line: Jellyfish are awesome!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Cool! State-of-the-art jellyfish nets!

speaker: Patrick
line: [touches one] Touch.

speaker: Guard
line: Don't touch.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob and Patrick walk up to a giant harpoon with gobs of jelly on it] Wow! The harpoon from "Jellyfish The Movie!"

speaker: Patrick
line: [touches it] Touch.

speaker: Guard
line: Don't touch!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [SpongeBob and Patrick walk up to a crowd, watching a fish with a giant sore on his cheek pointing to a board with a mean jellyfish picture on it] Look! Dr. Manowar! The guy who got stung by Big Lenny and lived!

speaker: Dr. Manowar
line: [Talking in a microphone] And now it only hurts when you touch it. [Pat goes up and touches it. Manowar screams in pain]

speaker: Patrick
line: Touch.

speaker: Guard
line: Do I have to follow you all day?!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Oh! Patrick, look! Can it be?

speaker: Patrick
line: Ice cream?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No, it's the Jellyspotters! [we see a crowd of people around a group of fish and a sea cucumber, obviously the leader. He has glasses and a crown thing coming from his head] Bikini Bottom's premier jellyfish enthusiast club! Ah! And their leader! The coolest jellyfish enthusiast ever! [close up on the cucumber] Kevin the Sea Cucumber!

speaker: Patrick
line: What's so great about a nerdy pickle?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: If I could just touch the hem of his pocket protector, then maybe some of his greatness would rub off on me.

speaker: Patrick
line: SpongeBob, as a friend, I must say that's really geeky. [a guy in a giant jellyfish costume walks by. Pat gasps] Oh my gosh! Jeffrey Jellyfish! Wait, Jeffrey! I have to touch you! [runs after him, followed by the guard yelling. Cut back to the Jellyspotters]

speaker: Guard
line: Hey! [Chases Patrick]

speaker: Kevin
line: Bamboo? I only use composite materials in my net handle. [the crowd furiously writes notes]

speaker: Crowd
line: [all muttering as they write] Composite materials?

speaker: Kevin
line: Next question. [the crowd furiously writes notes again]

speaker: Crowd
line: [all muttering again] Next question?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [pops out in front of the crowd, his pupils are huge and he speaks as if in a trance] Hi, Kevin.

speaker: Kevin
line: Hi. What is your question?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hi, Kevin.

speaker: Kevin
line: Whatever. Next question, please. [he points to the other side of the crowd, SpongeBob pops up there too]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hi, Kevin.

speaker: Kevin
line: Hello, loser. All right, you, way in the back.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [pops up in the back] Hi, Kevin.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hi, Kevin. I'm your biggest fan.

speaker: Kevin
line: You're too kind. [yells] Security!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: No, wait! I would do anything for you!

speaker: Kevin
line: Why don't you go jump off a building? [we hear SpongeBob's screams and see him fall from the view through the window. Then SpongeBob appears back in the building]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Anything!

speaker: Kevin
line: Punch yourself in the face. [SpongeBob does so with a boxing glove. His face is pushed in a bit] Doesn't that hurt you?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [holds up a metal glove with spiked knuckles] Do you want it to hurt me, Kevin? [Kevin and the Jellyspotters all laugh]

speaker: Kevin
line: That was the best! [continue laughing] This guy's great! We have got to bring this guy jellyfishing with us!

speaker: Anchovy Jellyspotter
line: No, Kevin, no. He's a geek.

speaker: Kevin
line: [whispering] Look, I won't let the guy join the club. I just want to see how many times he can get stung before he goes running home like a baby.

speaker: Anchovy Jellyspotter
line: Meep-meep, Kevin's a genius. [the other anchovies Jellyspotters join in repeatedly saying so]

speaker: Kevin
line: Hey kid, how would you like to try out for the Jellyspotters?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [on a hospital bed. The doctor fish zaps him with the defibrillator and SpongeBob jumps up] I'd love it! [cut to Kevin and the fish supposedly walking through Jellyfish Fields] [off-screen with their legs]

speaker: Kevin
line: Ah, nothing like driving through Jellyfish Fields with the top down, eh, Jellyspotters? [the Jellyspotters meep in agreement. Pan down to see that SpongeBob is carrying them. He stops]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [breathes out] Uh... here we are, Jellyfish Fields. Ohh... [he collapses. The Jellyspotters get off]

speaker: Kevin
line: I hope you didn't forget our nets.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I didn't forget them, Kevin. They're in the trunk. [SpongeBob turns around, and the back of his pants opens like a trunk. The group takes the nets and jars out, revealing SpongeBob's buttocks. SpongeBob now has all the nets and jars in his arms] I can't believe I'm actually out here with the Jellyspotters! I mean all my life I wanted to be a Jellyspotter? [SpongeBob starts to vibrate and jump around] and now I'm out here with you guys with the nets and the jars and the jellyfish and I'm with Kevin and Kevin's with me and we're all with each other and we're all jellyfishing and it's fun and-

speaker: Kevin
line: Hold it! [Sponge freezes, literally] Before you become a Jellyspotter, you have to pass a rigorous test.

speaker: Jellyspotters
line: [laughing] Meep! Vigorous test! [continuing laughing]

speaker: Kevin
line: [To the Jellyspotters] Quiet!, Shh! [To SpongeBob] Your first test catch a jellyfish. [a jellyfish flies into SpongeBob's net]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey, I caught one! Am I a Jellyspotter now?

speaker: Jellyspotters
line: Meep, he caught one. ["Meep" discussions]

speaker: Kevin
line: Uh, that doesn't count. [he slaps the net and the jellyfish stings him, it flies away.] Ouch! [Kevin grows a giant red sore where he got stung]

speaker: Anchovy Jellyspotter
line: [off-screen in ominous voice] Wha-wha-wha!

speaker: Kevin
line: I meant two jellyfish! [two jellyfish fly in SpongeBob's net]

speaker: Jellyspotters
line: Two jellyfish, meep, in the net. ["Meep" discussions]

speaker: Kevin
line: That's not what I meant. I meant 20 jellyfish! [20 jellyfish fly into SpongeBob's net]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [counting] Oh, Uh, Let's see, one, two, three? [Kevin growls and kicks the net, causing all the jellyfish to sting him.]

speaker: Kevin
line: Ooh-ooh-ow! Ooh! Ow! [He now has a bunch of sores, seen after the jellyfish fly off]

speaker: Anchovy Jellyspotter
line: [off-screen in ominous voice] Wha-wha-wha! [cut to the fields, where Kevin has a jar of jelly]

speaker: Kevin
line: Jellyspotters allow jellyfish to eat jelly off their face. [Kevin smears some jelly on SpongeBob]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Who wants to lick my cheeks? [some jellyfish swim by] I see I have some takers?

speaker: Kevin
line: How does it feel? [SpongeBob now has jellyfish on his face, put together in the form of a mustache and beard. He laughs]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: It tickles my nose!

speaker: Kevin
line: Not for long. [he and the Jellyspotters snicker. SpongeBob sneezes and all of the jellyfish fly onto Kevin's eyes. They sting them and now he has big red swollen eyes]

speaker: Anchovy Jellyspotter
line: Wha-wha-wha!

speaker: Kevin
line: [turns to the fish making that taunting noise] Will you cut that out?!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Am I in the Jellyspotters now?

speaker: Kevin
line: No! I have many more tests for you to take! [cut to SpongeBob walking upside-down, with a net and a jellyfish]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Am I in the Jellyspotters now? [the jellyfish stings Kevin's nose, making it big and swollen]

speaker: Kevin
line: No. [cut to SpongeBob having caught a jellyfish blindfolded]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Am I in the Jellyspotters now? [the jellyfish stings Kevin's crown and it becomes swollen, into some broccoli-shaped blister]

speaker: Kevin
line: No. [cut to just SpongeBob]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Now? [we hear zapping sounds. Now Kevin's ears are big and swollen]

speaker: Kevin
line: No. [cut to just SpongeBob again]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Now? [more zapping noises. Kevin's lips are now huge and swollen]

speaker: Kevin
line: No. [cut to Sponge once more]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Now? [Jellyfish zaps Kevin. Kevin's buttocks is now huge and swollen]

speaker: Kevin
line: [screaming] No!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Now? [Jellyfish zaps Kevin] Now? [Jellyfish zaps Kevin] Now? [now, Kevin is just a big swollen sea cucumber thing]

speaker: Kevin
line: Okay, SquarePants, it is your turn to get zapped! I mean... are you ready for your final test?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I'm ready!

speaker: Kevin
line: You'd better be, because we're going to capture a queen jellyfish.

speaker: SpongeBob
line: A queen? Can I help?

speaker: Kevin
line: Oh, don't worry. We can't do it without you! [cut to SpongeBob being tied by arms and legs, hanging from two sticks]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: This is fantastic! I've never been bait before! I don't think I've ever seen a queen jellyfish either.

speaker: Kevin
line: Well, then you've probably never used a queen jellyfish call. Why don't you try it out? [he hands him a blower thing. SpongeBob blows and it makes a weird groaning sound that sort of sounds like, "Loser."]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey, I've heard this call before.

speaker: Kevin
line: I'll bet you have. [the Jellyspotters walk off]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hey, where are you going?

speaker: Kevin
line: Oh, don't worry, we'll be right behind this bush. [they kneel down behind it. Kevin gets zapped again. He stands up covered in sores, a jellyfish flies off] Who's got my sting ointment? [he kneels down again]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: This is great! When I pass this test, I'll be an official jellyfish spotter! [he continues to blow that horn thing, which keeps saying, "Loser." Soon, it becomes dark and he's tired of blowing] Hey Kevin, I don't think it's working. Nothing? [a giant shadow looms over SpongeBob. He looks up, to find a giant jellyfish with a tiara. It's The Mechanic Jellyfish Queen!] Hey, hey Kevin! She's here! Look, she's here! She's here, Kevin! She's here? [the bush blows away, revealing nothing? except Kevin's ointment. SpongeBob screams and the jellyfish zaps the poles off. SpongeBob runs up and down hills, dodging the jellyfish's stingers. He comes upon a cliff and can't go any further. He begs on his hands and knees] Please don't be angry, your highness! I would have let you go! [cries. Just then, a screen on the jellyfish opens, revealing Kevin and the Jellyspotters. They laugh. SpongeBob gasps] Kevin!

speaker: Kevin
line: That's right! You should have seen the look on your face when we zapped you!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But... What about my final test? [they all laugh]

speaker: Kevin
line: Did you think we'd actually let you into the Jellyspotters?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: But Kevin, I was your biggest fan!

speaker: Kevin
line: So were they. [he points to the bottom of the cliff, where a bunch of people are by a fire. One looks up]

speaker: Guy
line: Look everybody, Kevin's back! [they all yell up at him in praise]

speaker: Kevin
line: You looked so dumb with your dorky jellyfish call! [He and the Jellyspotters imitating] Loser, loser, loser loser loser! [SpongeBob blushes and sad frowns]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: I am not a loser!

speaker: Kevin
line: Loooooser! [as Kevin continues saying "loser," a giant, even bigger than the queen, jellyfish comes from the cliff. It is wearing a robe and a crown.] Ah-ha-ha-ha! [The Jellyspotters finally notice] Cnidaria rex!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: King Jellyfish! [the king sees the queen and is instantly smitten. It grows lips and puckers up]

speaker: Kevin
line: Kissyface! [the queen and SpongeBob run off. The king gives chase. The queen eventually crashes into a billboard for Kevin's Ointment and breaks apart.]

speaker: Jellyfish King
line: Huh? [The king sees Kevin, the Jellyspotters, and SpongeBob. Record scratch sound effect. Kevin quivers.] [angrily] Keeeee-viiiiin! [it zaps the ground and they all run off. They find refuge in a cave. The king jellyfish comes back with a helmet and football uniform and attempts to bash in the cave. Inside, the Jellyspotters and SpongeBob are pretty scared. The bashing stops]

speaker: Kevin
line: I think he's gone. One of you go out and check. [the Jellyspotters push one fish out of the cave to see. The anchovy Jellyspotter looks around and "meep-meep"s happily, giving the all-clear. But he's zapped and "meep-meep"s not to come out. All the Jellyspotters go around Kevin asking what to do]

speaker: Jellyspotters
line: Meep! Save us! Meep Kevin, save us! [More meep begging]

speaker: Kevin
line: Don't look at me! I was just in this for the fashion! [close up on Kevin's pants, with patches, stickers and a toy jellyfish coming out of his pocket] It's hopeless! We're trapped! We're trapped! [he sits down and curls to a ball] Help me, mommy! Help me! I want my blankie! I want my blankie!

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [to fishes] Now what do we do? [the Jellyspotters get down and imitate Kevin. SpongeBob decides enough is enough and goes out to face the king. The king growls and buzzes. SpongeBob takes out a bottle of bubble mix in response.]

speaker: Jellyfish King
line: What the? [SpongeBob inhales and blows a bubble in the shape of a giant cherry pie. The king, satisfied, leaves to eat his snack.] Hmm? Mm, mm, mm! Yummy! [The fishes come out and gather around SpongeBob. Other jellyspotters "meep" happily. Kevin follows]

speaker: Kevin
line: I can't believe it! How did you know?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: [laughs] Everybody loves pie!

speaker: Anchovy Jellyspotter
line: [ominous voice] Wha-wha-wha!

speaker: Kevin
line: Well, SquarePants, that was impressive, but you're still not in the club because you didn't catch a queen jellyfish. [the other Jellyspotters narrow their eyes and run over to Kevin, off-screen] Wait, what are you doing? [rip] Aaah! [the fish run back with Kevin's crown and place it on SpongeBob. He laughed]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Wow, I didn't know this was a hat! [Kevin shown with a torn part where his "crown" used to be. Kevin stands in agony, both for emotional and physical reasons.]

speaker: Kevin
line: [teary-eyed] It wasn't... [cut to back at the convention. SpongeBob talks to Patrick]

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Hi, Patrick!

speaker: Patrick
line: Hi, SpongeBob! Did you get into that club?

speaker: SpongeBob
line: Yeah, but I turned them down. It's not about Kevin, it's about jellyfish!

speaker: Patrick
line: Well, SpongeBob, I'm glad you learned your lesson. [pan out to see that Pat has Jeffrey Jellyfish tied up in a wagon he's towing] Hero worship is unhealthy. [the two walk off] C'mon, Jeffrey.
